pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gyur la/ nyi ma re re thams cad la 'ang chos bshad pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'jug par gyur cing chos bshad pa thams cad la 'ang byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed lung bstan par

gyur la/ gang gis shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das nas/ byang chub sems dpa' gcig mtshan mar bzhag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams de bzhin gshegs pa dag gis de tsam du stong na/

phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sha'i spyan tha mal pas gzigs par 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu skyes pa'i sems can de dag gi sems de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen pa'i de bzhin

gshegs pa de dag gis stong pa lta ci smos/ de nas nyan thos chen po de dag dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ tshig 'di skad du bdag cag gi ston pa de dag de ltar rdzu 'phrul che/ de ltar mthu che/ de ltar

ye shes gzigs pa chen po dang ldan te/ bdag cag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/ /zhes smras so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' gang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa steng gi bar snang la 'khod pa de dag bar snang de las babs nas/

bcom ldan 'das dang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bskor nas phyogs bcur dong ngo / /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lha'i bu dpal bzangs ldan gyis 'di skad ces smras so/ /

'jam dpal khyod kyis mdzad pa mdzad cing sems can tshad med pa byang chub tu yongs su smin par mdzad pa legs so legs so/ /'jam dpal khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub yongs su smin par bgyid pa'i

chos las brtsams te spobs par mdzod cig /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub yongs su smin par byed pa'i chos ni sum bcu rtsa lnga'o/ /sum bcu rtsa lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dus su

skul ba dang / tshod la skul ba dang / ran par skul ba dang / dbang po la skul ba dang / brtan par skul ba dang / pha rol du phyin pa la skul ba dang / thabs la skul ba dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa la skul ba dang / byams pa chen po la skul ba dang / snying rje

chen po la skul ba dang / theg pa chen po la skul ba dang / theg pa dman pa la skul ba dang / bden pa la skul ba dang / de bya ba la skul ba dang / chos srung bar skul ba dang / thos pa bstan par skul ba dang / sems can sna

tshogs su mi dbye bar skul ba dang / tshul khrims 'chal pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa la sbyin pa'i gnas su mtshungs par skul ba dang / bdud kyi las bstan par skul ba dang / dam bcas pa nyams 'og tu chud par

skul ba dang / 'khor bas yongs su mi skyo bar skul ba dang / bdud gdul bar skul ba dang / byas pa shes pa dang / byas pa gzo bar skul ba dang / rgyu zad pa la 'jug par skul ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo la mi 'jigs par skul ba dang / de bzhin

gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / rim gro bya bar skul ba dang sems can thams cad la ci bya snyam pa la spro bar skul ba dang / 'jig rten gyi chos dang ma 'dres par skul ba dang / dgon pa la dga' bar skul ba dang /

'dod pa chung zhing chog shes par skul ba dang / 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa ma grol ba dgrol ba dang / dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar skul ba dang / dkon

mchog gsum gyi gdung mi 'chad par skul ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su dag par blang bar skul ba ste/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub yongs su smin par byed pa'i chos ni sum cu rtsa lnga

po de dag go/ /lha'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' yongs su smin par byas pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las bskyod du med pa yin te/ de ni phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis thul bar mi nus so/ /

de ni phyin chad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i dregs pa bcus dregs par mi 'gyur ro/ /bcu gang zhe na tshul khrims kyis dregs pa dang / thos pas dregs pa dang / spobs pas dregs pa dang / rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang tshigs su

bcad pas dregs pa dang / dgon par gnas pas dregs pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsnyungs pas dregs pa dang gzugs dang / longs spyod dang dbang phyug dang / g.yog 'khor gyis dregs pa dang /

brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba bsnyen bkur byed pas dregs pa dang bsam gtan dang / mngon par shes pas dregs pa dang / sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la dad pa'i lha dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang /

dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dag 'dod pa dang bstod pa dang bsngags par byed pa des kyang snyems pa med pa yin te/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i dregs pa bcu po de dag gis mi

snyems rab tu mi snyems so de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lha'i bu dpal bzangs ldan gyis 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal khyod phyogs gang na gnas pa dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang na spyod pa der ni sangs rgyas

'byung bar blta'o/ /de na ni chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar blta'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no lha'i bu de de bzhin te ji skad smras pa bzhin no/ /phyogs gang na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gnas pa de ni stong pa ma

yin par mngon no/ /gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod par 'gyur ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi bdag po nyid brtson par mdzad do/ /gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la nyan par byed/ mos par byed pa'i sems can de dag ni nga'i yin par 'gyur ro/ /

gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa dang / mos pa'i sems can de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas 'dul bar blta'o/ /gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang / de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / gnas brtan 'od srung chen po dang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu dam pa dag ji tsam du chos kyi rnam

grangs 'di blang ba dang / gzung ba dang bshad pa dang kun chub par byed pa'i phyir khyed la gtad do/ /nga ni ring por mi thogs par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur gyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi bya
ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'dis gnas par gyis shig /byams pas gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung lags na/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags 'di ji ltar

gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzhi pa sgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang / byang chub sems dpa' yongs su smin par byed pa
zhes bya bar zung shig /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lha dang /
mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dra zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa bzhi pa sgrub pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ /
@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ tri d+harma ka nA ma sU tra/ bod skad du/ chos gsum pa zhes bya ba'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs
te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di na mi blun po la la dam pa'i chos ma yin pa gsum dang ldan na sbyin pa dag mi sbyin zhing bsod nams dag mi byed la/

tshul khrims yang dag par blangs nas gnas par mi byed do/ /gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags dang / ser sna dang / bag med pa ste/ dge slong dag 'di na mi blun po la la dam pa'i chos ma yin pa
gsum po de dag dang ldan pas sbyin pa dag ma byin zhing bsod nams dag ma byas la/ tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te gnas par ma byas pas/ lus zhig ste shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro
log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag skyes bu dam pa dam pa'i chos gsum dang ldan pa ni sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing / bsod nams dag byed la/ tshul khrims yang

dag par blangs te gnas par byed do/ /gsum po gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ma chags pa dang / ser sna med pa dang / bag yod pa'o/ /dge slong dag dam pa'i chos gsum po de dag dang ldan na skyes bu dam pa sbyin pa
dag byin zhing / bsod nams dag byed la/ tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te gnas par byas pas lus zhig ste shi ba'i 'og tu bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /
bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/ bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas/ ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gang phyir ser sna bag med pas/ /sbyin pa sbyin par mi
byed de/ /de phyir bsod nams 'dod pa yi/ /mkhas pas sbyin pa sbyin par bya/ /ser sna can gyis 'jigs pa ni/ /bkres dang skom pa 'di yin na/ /gang gis 'jigs pas 'dir ma byin/ /de nyid mi yi
'jigs pa yin/ /gang gis ser sna'i dbang gis na/ /yod ma byin pa 'jigs pa ste/ /'jig rten 'di dang pha rol du/ /de yis byis pa bgos par 'gyur/ /gang dag ser sna spangs nas kyang / /dus su sbyin

pa sbyin byed na/ /shi yang de ni shi ma yin/ /rgyags bzang po yi 'gron po bzhin/ /gang dag shin du btang dka' ba/ /nyung ngu 'am mang po gtong byed na/ /btang dka' gtong ba de dag ni/ /dka' ba'i las dag byed pa
yin/ /dam pa min pas mi rtogs te/ /dam pa chos las 'da' mi byed/ /de phyir dam pa dam pa min/ /'di nas shi bar 'gyur ba na/ /dam pa min pa dmyal bar 'gro/ /dam pa dag ni mtho ris 'gro/ /rga bas

gtses pa la ni skyabs med de/ /tshe thung bas ni srog khyer dus kyang nye/ /'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'di mthong rnams kyis ni/ /bsod nams bde sbyor dag ni bya ba'i rigs/ /bud med spangs 'dir sbyor bas 'tsho ba gang / /

dka' bas byin pa nyung ngu byin na yang / /stong gi mchod sbyin brgya stong byed pa ni/ /de yi bcu drug char yang mi phod do/ /ci phyir mchod sbyin yangs shing rgya che ba/ /mchod sbyin 'thun pa de yi lam mi 'gro/ /

ji ltar stong gi mchod sbyin che rnams kyang / /de yi bcu drug char mi 'gyur zhe na/ /byis pa la la gsod cing 'ching byed 'dir/ /gzhan nor ma byin len byed brlag par 'gyur/ /mchi ma'i gdong bcas chad par bcas pa yi/ /

yon de'i mchod sbyin 'thun pa'i lam mi 'gro/ /de ltar mchod sbyin yangs shing rgya che ba/ /mchod sbyin 'thun pa'i lam du mi 'gro la/ /de ltar stong gi mchod sbyin stong rnams kyang / /de yi bcu drug char yang mi phod do/ /

la la gang dag gzu lums ma yin pa/ /chos bzhin nor rnams thob pa gtong byed pa/ /de dag gtang dka' de rnams btang bas na/ /rang gi bsod nams kyis ni lha gnas 'gro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka'

stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /chos gsum pa zhes bya ba'i mdo rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de de ba tsan dras bsgyur/ lo ts+tsha ba dpal brtsegs kyis zhus te gtan
la phab pa/ / @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya d+harma ke tu ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyi mdo theg pa chen po'o/ /

sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra

ba na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'dug pa stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chos du dang ldan

na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bcu dang ldan na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs

pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'dir byang chub sems dpa' dad pa dang ldan par bya ba dang / byang chub kyi sems dang ldan par bya ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su mi gtang ba dang / dgon par bsten

cing 'du 'dzi spang ba dang / bla ma dang mkhan po'i gdams ngag yongs su stsal ba dang / snying rje dang ldan pa dang / mang du thos pa dang ldan pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang / brtson 'grus phun

sum tshogs pas don ma lus par sgrub pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / snying rje dang byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal mtshan dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag bcom
ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyi mdo rdzogs so// //

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ d+harma sa mu dra nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ theg pa chen po'i mdo chos rgya mtsho zhes bya ba/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgya mtsho'i gling

phran po ta la ka'i ri la rgyal ba'i sras mi ldog pa phal po ches bskor cing mdun du byas te bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten gyi dbang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la bka' stsal pa/

skyes bu dam pa chos kyi gtam ci 'dod pa dri bar gyis shig /ces 'dod pa la tog cing mi sten pa dang / mi 'chang ba dang / nga rgyal med pa dang / shes rab dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang / stong pa nyid la shin du mos pa dang ldan te/

yod pa dang med pa spangs pa dang / yang dag pa ma yin pa la rtags pas grangs med par yang 'khor bar 'gyur/ ji ltar na dge bar gsungs pa'i chos dang 'dul ba la rab tu byung zhing yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bsnyen par

rdzogs pa lags/ 'gro ba tha dad pa'i chos rnams las 'das pa dang / gnas ngan len la rten cing 'jug pa'i sems dang / yid dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa las 'das te/ mi gnyis pa'i chos thos pa ni shin du rab tu

byung ba'o/ /sems can gang tha dad pa 'di lta bus rab tu byung ba de ni yang dag par rab tu byung ba'o/ /gang rab tu byung yang tshul khrims dang / spyod yul dang / 'tsho ba dang / lta ba dang / bsam pa nyams pa ste/

de ni mgo dang kha spu bregs kyang don med pa ste/ rnyog pa 'chang bas na rnyog pa des ngan song du gzhol ba yin no/ /ngas dad pas byin pa spyod du gnang ba ni rigs pas grol ba ste/ dge slong gang brtson pa mi 'dor ba des

gzugs mi 'dor/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi 'dor/ phung po lnga tha dad pa dang / ril gyis brtags pa'i rang bzhin bas na mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang /

bdag med par lta ba de dag kyang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis khams dang / skye mched kyi lha rnams ma yin par spro ba dam par byed pas rtag tu sgom mo/ /snying po med pa dang / 'brum pa can/ zug rngu can dang ldan pa/

skyon can/ pha rol po slu ba'i chos nyid ces sun 'byin pa de dag kyang mi dmigs pa'i tshul du sbyor bas/ gang lus kyis lus la sred pa dang / lus la byams pa dang / lus la bdag yid ches pa dang / lus la zhen

pa de dag rab tu spong ngo / /gang 'di lta bu'i dge slong ni dge bar gsungs pa'i chos dang 'dul ba la rab tu byung bar gyur/ dad pas bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa yin te/ 'di lta bu'i dge slong ni lha dang

'jig rten du bcas pa rnams kyi sbyin gnas su gyur pa'o/ /de nas byams pa byang chub sems dpas 'jig rten gyi dbang po byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ci las dgongs te 'gro ba tha dad pa'i

chos rnams la 'das shing 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams thob pa de ni dge bar gsungs pa'i chos dang 'dul ba la rab tu byung bar gyur/ bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa zhes gsungs/ gzhan

gang zhig rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs kyang bdag bslus pa ste/ pha bang ltar byi ba yang ma yin/ bya yang ma yin pa bzhin du de ni khyim pa yang ma yin/ rab tu byung ba yang ma yin pas na glen pa'i

skyes bu de de lta bu'i tshul du zung shig /skyes bu dam pa 'gro ba tha dad pa'i chos de dag ni sgyu ma lta bu ste/ de las 'da' bar yang mi nus/ 'gro ba tha dad pa'i chos ni yongs su ma rdzogs pas na de las 'da'
bar yang dka'/ sems can gyi khams ni phyi na yang med/ nang na yang med de gnyis kar yang dmigs su med pas na/ gang sems can gyi khams kyi dngos po de ni 'gro ba tha dad pa'i chos kyi dngos po ste/

de las 'da' bar yang dka' ba de la kye rgyal ba'i sras bcom ldan 'das kyis 'gro ba tha dad pa'i chos las 'das shing 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thob pa'i dge slong de ni rab tu byung bar gyur/ bsnyen par rdzogs

par yang dag par rdzogs pa ste/ de ni dad pas byin pa spyod pa'i mchod gnas su gyur pa'o zhes gsungs pa yang kye rgyal ba'i sras rten pa'i gnas med na de la 'thob pa gang ci ste 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos

rnams 'thob par 'gyur na de ni dmigs par gyur pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid ni mi dmigs pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'di ltar dgongs nas
'gro ba tha dad pa'i chos las 'das shing 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thob pa de ni dge slong yang dag par gyur pa ste/ dad pas byin pa spyod pa'i mchod gnas so/ /de nas byams pa byang chub sems dpas

'jig rten gyi dbang po byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ci las dgongs te/ brtson pa mi 'dor ba'i dge slong gang gis gzugs mi 'dor/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par

shes pa mi 'dor ba de ni rab tu byung ba'i dge slong ste/ de ni dge bar gsungs pa'i chos kyis 'dul ba la shin du rab tu byung bar gyur pas na 'di lta bu'i dge slong ni dad pas byin pa spyod pa'i mchod gnas su gyur pa'o zhes gsungs/

'jig rten gyi dbang pos smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcom ldan 'das kyis chos nyid la dgongs te chos kyi dbyings nang na yang med/ phyi na yang med de/ gnyi gar yang dmigs su med pas na nad med par btags pa dang /
mi skye bar btags pa dang / mi 'gag par btags pa rnams gdags su med pa ste/ sems can gyi khams mnyam pa bzhin du chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa bzhin du sems can gyi khams

mnyam pa nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid du mi gnyis te gnyis su med do/ /de mi gnyis te gnyis su med pas na de la dor ba yang med/ mi dor ba yang med/ gang dor ba yang med/ mi dor ba yang med pas
na de la 'da' ba dang / thob par mi nus te bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'di ltar dgongs nas gdags su med pa'i dge slong btags pa la mi 'jug go/ /gang yi ge med pa'i dge slong yi ge las 'das pa ste/

de la grangs kyis bstan par yang mi rung ste/ de ni mi 'ong mi 'gro mi gnas mi 'dug nyal bar yang mi rtog go/ zhi ba dang nye bar zhi ba rnams mi dmigs pa'i dge slong la brtags pa ste/ spyod pa rnams kyang brtags pa'o/ /

log pa la rnam pa mang du rtog pa'i dge slong spyod pa ni ma brtags pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ltar dgongs nas 'di lta bu'i dge slong ni dad pas sbyin pa spyod pa'i sbyin gnas su gyur pa'o/ /de nas bcom
ldan 'das kyis spyan ras gzigs dbang po byang chub sems dpa' la dge ba byin te ngas dgongs te bshad pa bzhin du skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis bstan pa ni dge'o dge'o/ /dge bar gsungs pa'i chos kyi 'dul

ba la rab tu byung ba 'di bla na med pa dam pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya ste/ 'di tshul khrims nyams pa dang / ma dul ba dang / nga rgyal mngon par byed pa rnams kyi mdun du mi bshad par gyis shig /de lta bu de dag rnams

kyi snyems pa spang ba'i phyir phyag rgya 'di la gang gis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes rab kyis bltas shing mi dmigs pa'i lus mngon du byas na/ des yid kyi lus myur du 'thob po/ /gang gi yid kyi lus des

grangs med pa'i sems can rnams byang chub tu smin par byed do/ /de nas chos kyi gzhung 'di bshad pa'i tshe dge slong bdun stong zag pa med par mi skye ba'i sems rnam par grol bar gyur/ byang chub sems

dpa' stong phrag bcu mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur/ dmigs pa can gyi dge slong lnga brgya chos kyi gzhung 'di mi sgrub cing mi 'jug pa dang / ma dad pas na stan las langs te dong ngo / /bcom ldan
'das ngas dgongs te gsungs pa 'di dag 'jig rten thams cad yid mi ches pa'i gnyen po yin pas na chos kyi gzhung 'di dmigs pa dang bcas pa rnams mi 'thun pa'o/ /yod pa ma yin pa la brten pa rnams
dang mi 'gal te/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis bzung ba rnams dang / zab mo'i chos la mos pa rnams dang / skyo zhing chog shes pas bsnyungs te dben pa la mngon par dga' ba rnams dang / sngon gyi
sangs rgyas rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa rnams kyis nga'i chos kyi gzhung 'di la ston par shes so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu gang zhig gnyid kyis log pa'i rmyi lam

na 'gro ba mang po'i mdun na smra zhing chos 'chad kyang chos de 'jig rten thams cad las ma grags na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras ci 'gro ba mang po de rnams yod de/ gang des sangs rgyas kyi chos bshad pa dang mi 'gal ba
snyam du sems sam/ byams pas smras pa/ rmyi lam ni yang dag par ma mchis pa ste/ 'khrul pa tsam zhing mchis par bas na de ngan 'gro phal po che la chos 'chad par gyur pa lta ga la zhig mchis/

kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar de bzhin du chos thams cad ni rmyi lam dang mtshungs te/ yang dag pa ma yin par 'byung bar byung nas kyang med par gyur pa ste/ kun rdzob kyang 'khrul pa tsam zhig yod kyi don dam par ni ma

yin no/ /'phags pa'i shes rab kyis ji lta ba mngon du byas na bsam gtan sems pa'i bsam gtan pa yang mi dmigs pa ste/ de la chos kyi tshul tsam zhig yod kyi kun du brtags pa dang gzhan gyi dbang las kyi

rnams ni yod pa ma yin no/ /de ltar de bzhin du chos 'di ni 'jig rten pa thams cad dang mi mthun pa'o/ /chos 'di dag la dmigs pa rnams kyis ni don dam par 'dzin gyi 'phags pa'i rnams ni mi dmigs so/ /
byis pa rnams mi shes pas de la mngon par zhen pas na dmyal ba dang / yi dags rnams kyi sdug bsngal gyis nyon mongs pa myong bar 'gyur ro/ /chos kyi gzhung 'di ji lta ba de ni dmigs pa'o/ /ji ltar

dmigs pa de ni chos thams cad do/ /de ltar dus gsum gyi chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid de/ mi dmigs pas na gang dmigs pa de ni rtogs pa'o/ /gang rtogs pa de ni thob pa/ gang thob pa de ni byang chub gang

byang chub pa de ni de bzhin nyid/ gang de bzhin nyid pa de ni yang dag pa'i mtha' gang yang dag pa'i mtha' de ni stong pa nyid/ gang stong pa nyid de ni mtshan ma med pa/ gang mtshan ma med pa de ni smon pa med pa/ gang smon pa med pa de ni

don dam pa/ gang don dam pa de ni chos kyi dbyings/ gang chos kyi dbyings de ni gnyis su med pa'i mtha' gang gnyis su med pa'i mtha' de ni dbu mar sgrub pa/ gang dbu mar sgrub pa de ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos

kyi sku rtag pa/ brtan pa mi 'gyur ba ste/ rtag pa yang ma yin/ mi rtag pa yang ma yin te/ de ni gdags pa yang ma yin/ mi gdags pa yang ma yin/ gang gdags pa yang ma yin/ mi gdags pa yang ma yin pa de ni 'jig

rten pa yang ma yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa yang ma yin/ gang 'jig rten pa yang ma yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa yang ma yin pa de ni brjod du med pa/ gang brjod du med pa de ni chung zad kyang med pa gang chung zad kyang

med pa de ni sems can rnams kyi bsod nams kyi zhing gang sems can rnams kyi bsod nams kyi zhing de ni ston pa/ gang ston pa de ni rnam par mi rtog pa/ gang rnam par mi rtog pa de ni dmigs pa med pa/ gang dmigs pa

med pa de ni mi 'gyur ba grub pa/ gang mi 'gyur ba grub pa de ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che ste/ 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir ji ltar mos pa thams cad

byed do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' mang po de dag gis tshig 'thun par smras pa/ chos kyi gzhung 'di gang na spyod pa'i sa phyogs de rdo rje lta bu ste/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams bzhugs pas

na sems can de myur du mngon par shes pa dang / dbang po rnon por 'gyur bar rig par bya'o/ /gang zhig chos kyi gzhung 'di la brjod dam/ 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ chub par byed dam/ kha ton du byed dam/ tshul

bzhin du yid la byed na de bdud kyi dbang du mi 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa 'di bshad nas 'jig rten gyi dbang po dang / byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / nyan thos chen

po rnams dang / lha dang mir bcas pa dang / lha ma yin dang / dri za'i 'jig rten rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa la mngon par dga'o/ /theg pa chen po'i mdo chos rgya mtsho zhes bya ba rdzogs so// // chos kyi rgya mo/

sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi gnas bshad pa le'u bcu ste/ bam po dang po/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu thams cad thal mo sbyor la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrims chen po bshad pa

sems thag pa nas nyon cig /mang po tshogs pa yid bsdus te nyon cig /bdag la kun tu ltung ba yod par shes na mthol tshangs byos shig /mthol tshangs byas na bde bar 'gyur ro/ /mthol tshangs ma byas na sdig phyir zhing zab tu skye'o/ /kun du ltung ba med na ma smra

bar 'khod cig dang / kun kyang gtsang mar mngon no/ /legs pa chen po yod pa'i rnams dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma la sogs pa brtag par nyon cig /sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyir na mchod rten

las chos byed pa'i tshe so sor thar pa la btsud cing lci ba dang / gus shing rin cher byos shig /so sor thar pa zhes bya ba'i tshul khrims ni 'di yin no/ /tshul khrims 'di bzung na mun pa las snang bar phrad pa dang mtshungs so/ /

mi dbul po las nor chen po thob pa dang mtshungs so/ /nad pa sman rnyed pa dang mtshungs so/ /btson khri mun nas phyung ba dang mtshungs so/ /lam ring por song ba las slar 'khor ba dang mtshungs te/ 'di ni kun gyi

mkhan po chen po yin par mngon pas sangs rgyas 'jig rten na bzhugs pa dang mi mtshungs pa med do/ /'jigs pa'i sems ni skye dka'/ dge ba'i sems ni g.yo dka' bas na kha na ma tho ba las brnyes te med snyam du

byas na chu'i thigs pa chung mod kyi rgyun gyis na snod chen po 'gang ngo / /yud tsam gyi bar du sdig byas pas na bstir med pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung ngo / /re shig mi lus stor na bskal pa khri'i bar du yang slar mi lus mi thob bo/ /

dar ba'i tshe mi sdod do/ /dper na ni rta rgyugs pa dang 'dra/ mi'i tshe yang rtag pa med de/ dba' rgal gyi chu 'bab pa bas kyang myur te/ de ring gson mod kyi/ sang gi gnya' yang dka'o/ /da dus kho na la bab kyis mang po'i rnams

so so nas sems gcig tu 'grus shing 'bogs pa btsal ba'i rigs so/ /bag byas la le lo bla khyad dang / nyal ba dang / gnyid kyis log cing rang nyams kyi yid mi bya'o/ /mtshan zhing ni sems bsdus la rtag par dkon

mchog gsum gzungs su bzung la phyal ba don med pa la nyon mongs ngal chad cing tshe phyi ma la yang rab tu 'gyod pa mthar ji 'ang thob pa med par mi bya'o/ /mang po'i rnams gcig nas gcig tu tshul khrims 'di bzhin

legs par byos shig /de'i tshe na sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyis mang po'i phyir chu bo gang gA'i brgya stong gi bye ma snyed kyis brjod du med pa'i chos kyi sgo mo'i mdo phye ste/ de'i nang nas sems kyis gnas spu nyag ma'i

mgo rnyed do/ /snga ma 'das pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la yang bshad do/ /da ltar gyi sangs rgyas la yang de bzhin 'chad do/ /ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la yang de bzhin du 'chad par 'gyur ro/ /dus gsum gyi

byang chub sems dpa' lobs pa dang / slob pa dang / slob par 'gyur ro/ /ngas bskal pa brgya'i bar du sems kyi gnas 'di byas pas na nga'i mkhan po rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sku zhes bya'o/ /khyed sangs rgyas

thams cad kyis ngas bshad do cog gcig nas gcig tu sems can thams cad la sems kyi gnas lam phye shig /de nas pad mo'i snying po'i snod kyi khams na gnam gyi 'od lham me lhang nge ba'i seng ge'i gdan gyi steng nas sangs rgyas

rnam par snang mdzad kyis 'od btang ste/ 'og gi me tog stong gi thog gi sangs rgyas la sbran te/ nga'i sems kyi gnas kyi chos kyi sgo mo'i le'u gzungs su zung la deng shig /yang gcig nas gcig tu 'bum phrag brgya'i yang

phrag stong gi shAkya thub pas sems can thams cad la mthar gyis nga'i yan chad kyi sems kyi gnas kyi chos kyi sgo mo'i le'u shod de khyod la sogs pa sems gcig tu gzungs su zung la byos shig /de nas me tog stong gi thog gi

sangs rgyas 'bum phrag brgya'i yang phrag stong gi shAkya thub pa pad mo'i snod kyi khams na lham me lhang nge ba'i seng ge'i khri las langs te/ so so nas mchi phyag 'tshal te phyir nur nas lus kun gyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'od btang

ste/ kun 'od kyi nang nas grangs med pa'i sangs rgyas phyung ste/ cig car grangs med pa'i me tog sngon po/ ser po/ dmar po/ dkar pos rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sku sangs rgyas la yon du gsol nas yan chad sems kyi phyi mo'i le'u

bshad pa yang khong du chud nas so sor pad mo'i snod kyi khams kyi nang du nub ste/ rang bzhin gyis bskal pa stong pa nyid kyi nang du nub nas me tog 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin thog mar byung ba'i gnas su slar song ste/ 'dzam bu'i gling byang chub kyi

shing drung du phyin nas rang bzhin gyi bskal pa me tog 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin las byung ste/ gdod rdo rje'i rgyal po'i gdan dang / 'od shin du bzang po'i khang par 'dug nas phyogs bcu'i chos rgya mtsho dang mtshungs par bshad do/ /de nas yang seng

ge'i khri las langs te sum bcu rtsa gsum gnam gyi pho brang du phyin nas gral bcu'i chos bshad do/ /de nas zung ma'i gnam du phyin te las su bya ba bcu bshad do/ /de nas yang khri las langs te rgyal chen ris bzhi'i gnam du phyin nas

phyogs shing lta ba bcu bshad do/ /de nas yang 'dug pa'i sa nas langs te/ 'phrul dga'i gnam du phyin nas bsam gtan mi 'gyur ba bcu bshad/ de nas yang 'dug pa'i sa nas langs te gnam bden gnam du phyin nas sa bcu'i chos bshad/

de nas yang bsam gtan gcig gi nang du phyin nas rdo rje bcu bshad/ de nas yang bsam gtan gnyis kyi nang du phyin nas bzod pa bcu'i chos bshad/ de nas yang bsam gtan gsum gyi nang du phyin nas smon lam bcu bshad/ de nas yang bsam

gtan bzhi pa'i nang chen po che ba dbang mchog 'du mched gnam gyi rgyal po'i pho brang du phyin te/ nga'i thog ma'i phyi mo'i pad mo me tog sna tshogs kyi khams rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sku'i sangs rgyas kyis sems kyi gnas kyi chos kyi phyi mo'i

le'u bshad pa bshad do/ /gzhan 'bum phrag brgya'i yang phrag stong gi shAkya thub pa yang de bzhin te gnyis su med do/ /tha dad pa yang med do/ /bsam gtan bskal pa'i le'u'i nang nas kyang zhib tu bshad do/ /de'i tshe shAkya thub pa pad

mo'i me tog snod kyi khams kyi shar phyogs nas byung nas lding ba'i khang bu'i nang du zhugs nas bdud kyis chos mnos pa bzhin du bshad zin nas/ yas babs te 'dzam bu'i gling gi ka pi lar skyes nas yum gyi mtshan ni lha

mdzes chen mo/ yab kyi mtshan ni zas gtsang ma/ nga bdag gi ming ni sid+d+hAR+tha zhes bya ste/ lo bdun na rab tu byung / lo sum bcu nas sangs rgyas su phyin nas nga'i mtshan ni shAkya thub pa zhes bya ste/ mi 'gyur ba'i gtsang ma'i sar

rdo rje'i me tog gi khri la 'dug nas dbang po chen po'i gnam gyi rgyal po'i pho brang du phyin te/ de'i nang gi 'dug pa bcu'i gnas mthar gyis bshad/ de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyis rus gtsang ma chen po'i gnam gyi rgyal po dra ba'i rgyal

mtshan mthong ba'i phyir grangs med pa'i khams dper na dra ba'i bu gu dang mtshungs par bshad na khams gcig nas gcig so so mi mthun te tha dad pa'i grangs med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sgo mo bshad pa 'ang de dang 'dra'o/ /ngas

khams 'dir lan brgyad stong phyin te/ khams 'dzam bu'i gling 'di'i phyir rdo rje'i khri steng du 'dug ste/ dbang po chen po'i gnam gyi rgyal po'i pho brang du phyin nas de'i nang gi mang po thams cad sems kyi gnas kyi mdo che'o/ /

de nas gnam gyi pho brang nas mar babs te 'dzam bu'i gling byang chub kyi shing drung du phyin nas de'i sa'i steng gi sems can blun po ma rabs rnams kyi phyir thog ma phyi mo rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sku sangs rgyas kyis sems kyi gnas kyi

nang bshad do/ /sems thog ma g.yos pa ni rtag par 'od snang ba'i tshul khrims gcig kha ton du klog go/ rdo rje rin po che'i tshul khrims ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thog ma'i phyi mo yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ni thog ma'i

phyi mo sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi sa bon no/ /sems can thams cad la yang sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyi skal ba yod do/ /thams cad kyi shes pa dang / kha dog dang / sems dang yid dang / sems so cog thams cad kun kyang

sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyi nang du 'dus so/ /tshul khrims kyi nang na rtag pa yun du rtag par bsod nams yod do/ /rtag pa yun du rtag par chos kyi lus yod do/ /so sor thar pa 'di rnams bcu ni sangs rgyas kyi dbyings nas byung nas chos kyi

tshul khrims byas te/ dus gsum gyi sems can thams cad kyis gzungs su 'dzin to/ /ngas da mang po 'di'i phyir zad pa'i mtha' med pa'i tshul khrims kyi le'u bcu bslabs te bshad do/ /rdzogs longs spyod pa nga bdag ste/ /

pad mo'i dbus su gdod bzhugs nas/ /mtha' bzhi'i me tog stong gi steng / /shAkya thub pa stong du bzhugs/ /me tog gcig khams 'bum phrag brgya/ /khams de gcig kyang sprul pa gcig /kun kyang byang chub shing drung

bzhugs/ /mnyam par sangs rgyas gnas su son/ /de yang 'bum phrag brgya pa stong / /rdzogs longs spyod pa rang bzhin lus/ /sprul pa 'bum phrag brgya stong po/ /kun kyang rdul phran mang por 'dren/ /cig car nga yi

gnas su 'ongs/ /sangs rgyas nga yi tshul khrims nyon/ /zil dngar sgo mo de nas bye/ /'ung nas 'bum phrag brgya stong po/ /slad du gtsang ma'i gnas su phyin/ /kun kyang byang chub shing drung bzhugs/ /nga yi mkhan po tshul

khrims kha ton lhogs/ /tshul khrims chen po rtogs par lnga bcu brgyad/ /tshul khrims snang khyad nyi zla bzhin/ /gcig du nor bu yang nyo 'dra/ /byang chub sems dpa' rdul phran bzhin/ /'di yi yon gyis yang dag 'grub/ /gdod ma rdzogs

longs spyod pa nyid kyis blags/ /ngas kyang de bzhin kha ton blags/ /byang chub sems dpa' gsar slob pa/ /klad la khyer zhing khrims bzung bzhin/ /thub bzhin gcig tu sems can ston/ /nga yi bde blag rtag par nyon/ /

sangs rgyas chos rnams tshul khrims snod/ /so sor thar pa shes rab bzhin/ /mang po yid kun brtags par ches/ /khyed rnams sangs rgyas phyin par 'ong / /nga yi sangs rgyas phyin zin kyang / /rtag par 'di bzhin yid ches byed/ /tshul khrims

le'u kun chog gtsang zin/ /yid sems yod pa thams cad ni/ /kun kyang sangs rgyas khrims kyis bsdu/ /sems can sangs rgyas khrims mnod pa/ /de nas sangs rgyas sa ru phyin/ /tshor chen sa dang mtshungs zin te/ /sangs rgyas

kun gyi bu yang dag /mang po kun gyis gus par byas/ /sems gcig brtul te nga klog nyon/ /de'i tshe na shAkya thub pa'i sangs rgyas thog ma byang chub shing drung bzhugs bla na med pa'i g.yung drung rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo/ /byang chub

sems dpa'i thog ma so sor thar pa'i 'dud pa ni pha ma dang / dge 'dun dang / dkon mchog gsum la sri zhu dang / yid dang mi 'gal bar bya'o/ /sri zhu byas te bla ma'i yid dang mi 'gal ba ni chos zab mor thob pa'i gzhung ste/ sri zhu'i

ming ni tshul khrims so/ /ming gcig tu ni sdom pa dang gtong ba'o/ /de nas 'od snang ba grangs med pa 'byung ngo / /de'i tshe 'bum phrag brgya stong mang po tshogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / gzugs yod pa'i khams kyi gnam

bcwa brgyad dang / 'dod pa'i khams kyi gnam rim pa drug gi lha dang / rgyal po chen po rnams thal mo sbyar te/ sems gcig tu mnyan nas sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims chen po blags te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bka' stsal pa/

nga da ltar zla ba phyed phyed cing bdag gis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrims kha ton du klog go/ khyed la sogs pa thog ma sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis kyang kha ton du lhogs shig /sems

g.yos te phyogs pa bcu dang / g.yo zhing bskyed pa bcu dang / rdo rje bcu pa dang / sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang kha ton du lhogs shig /'ung na tshul khrims kyi 'od kha nas byung ste rgyu yod/ rkyen med pa'i 'od ma yin te/

'od sngon po dang / dmar po dang ser po/ dkar po/ nag po yang ma yin/ kha dog kyang ma yin/ sems kyang ma yin/ yod pa yang ma yin/ med pa yang ma yin/ rgyu rkyen gyi chos kyang ma yin te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ni gdod

ma phyi mo byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ni lam gyi rtsa ba bas na mang po thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams kyi rtsa ba'i phyi mo zhes bya'o/ /'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams kyis kyang gzungs su gzung ba'i rigs so/ /

legs par bslabs pa'i rigs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams brtags par nyon cig /sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims nod na ni rgyal po dang rgyal bu dang / blon po che phra dang / dge slong pho smos dang / gzugs kyi khams kyi gnam bcwa

brgyad dang / 'dod pa'i khams gnam drug dang / gdol pa dang / nying grum dang / pho g.yem dang / mo g.yem dang / bran pho smos dang / lha ma srin sde brgyad dang / phyag brnyen dang / byol song dang / 'phrul zhing 'gyur ba'i

mi la sogs te chos kyi mkhan po'i tshig brda phrad pa'i rnams thams cad tshul khrims mnod du rung ste/ kun kyang ming rab tu gtsang ma zhes bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyis sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams la bka' stsal pa/ so sor thar pa la

phas pham pa bcu yod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims mnos pa ni tshul khrims 'di kha ton du ma blags na byang chub sems dpa' yang ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi sa bon yang ma yin/ nga yang 'di bzhin du kha ton du klog go/ /

lobs zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / phyis slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / da ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la ngas so sor thar pa'i gzungs kyi mdo tsam zhig bshad kyis bslab

cing gzungs su gzung ba'i rigs so/ /sangs rgyas kyis sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams la bka' stsal pa/ bdag gis bsad pa dang / mi gzhan gsod du bcug pa dang / thams cad kyis gsod pa gsod pa la sdod pa gsod pa mthong na dga'

bar sems pa/ sngags dang / rngad mo byas te bsad pa/ gsad pa'i rgyu/ gsad pa'i rkyen/ gsad pa'i chos byed pa/ gsod pa'i las byed pa la sogs te sems yod do cog la ched kar gsad du mi rung / 'di lta ste/

byang chub sems dpa' de ni rtag par snying rje ba dang / sri zhu che zhing mi 'gal ba'i sems rtag par g.yos te bags kyis sems can thams cad kyi ra mda' dang / 'or ba bya ba'i rigs so/ /bdag gis rang nyams byas te snying tshim par

sems can bsad na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu bdag gis ma byin par blangs sam/ pha log po ma byin par len du bcug gam/ thabs kyis ma byin par blangs sam/ ma byin par len pa'i rgyu/

ma byin par len pa'i rkyen/ ma byin par len pa'i las byed pa/ sngags sgyu ma byas te nor khyer ba la sogs te/ lha ma srin dang / bdag po yod pa dang / yang blo'i nor rdzas dang / nor rdzas so cog la khab dang / rtswa nyag ma

gcig la ngas ched kar ma byin par blangs su mi rung ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin skyed la/ sri zhu'i yid dang mi 'gal zhing / byams zhing snying rje bar byas te rtag par sems can no cog gi yon tan dang

bsod nams bskyed pa'i rigs so/ /de la slar log par mi'i nor rdzas ma byin par blangs na byang chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu bdag mi tshangs par spyod dam/ gzhan mi tshangs par spyod par bstan nam/ bud med do

cog la mi tshangs par spyod par byed pa dang / gzhan la mi tshangs par spyod pa dang / mi tshangs par spyod pa'i rgyu dang / mi tshangs par spyod pa'i rkyen dang / mi tshangs par spyod pa'i chos byed pa dang / mi tshangs par spyod pa'i

las byed pa dang / byol song dang / lha dang / lha ma srin gyi bu mo la mi tshangs par spyod pa dang / chos dang 'gal ba'i mi tshangs par spyod na byang chub sems dpa' ni sri zhu dang mi 'gal ba'i sems kyis sems can thams cad thar pa'i

ra mda' bya zhing chos gtsang ma gzhan la sbyin pa'i rigs so/ /de la slar mi'o cog la mi tshangs par spyod pa bskyed de byol song dang / ma dang bu mo dang / sring mo la sogs te gnyen pa drug la mi tshangs par spyod pa byas te/ byams shing snying

rje ba med na de ni byang chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu bdag gis brdzun byas sam/ pha rol po brdzun zer bar bstan tam/ thabs kyis brdzun byas pa dang / brdzun gyi rgyu byas pa dang / brdzun gyi rkyen

byas pa dang / brdzun gyi chos byed pa dang / brdzun gyi las byed pa dang / mthong ba la ma mthong zhes zer ba dang / ma mthong ba la mthong zhes zer ba dang / lus dang sems kyis brdzun byas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' ni rtag par

tshig drang po skye zhing gcig tu na sems can gyi tshig drang po bskyed pa yin na/ de la slar log par sems can thams cad kyi tshig mi drang ba dang / yon po la lta ba dang / yon po'i las byed par bskyod na de ni byang chub sems dpa'i phas

pham pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu smyo ba'i khu ba bdag 'tshong ngam/ pha log po smyo ba'i khu ba 'tshong bar bstan tam/ thabs kyis smyo ba'i khu ba 'tshong ngam/ smyo ba'i khu ba 'tshong ba'i rgyu byed dam/ smyo ba'i khu ba 'tshong ba'i rkyen byed dam/

smyo ba'i khu ba 'tshong ba'i chos byed dam/ smyo ba'i khu ba 'tshong ba'i las byed pa la sogs te/ smyo ba'i khu ba'o cog 'tshong du mi rung / smyo ba'i khu ba'i rkyen gyis kha na ma tho ba skye'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can thams cad la

snang zhing drang ba'i shes rab bskyed pa'i rigs na/ slar log par sems can thams cad kyi phyin ci log gi sems bskyed na byang chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu rab tu byung ba dang / ma byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'

dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma'i nyes pa bdag gis 'phyas su byas sam/ gzhan 'phyas byed par bstan tam/ 'phya ba'i rgyu byas sam/ 'phya ba'i rkyen byas sam/ 'phya ba'i chos dang / 'phya ba'i las byed na byang chub sems dpa' ni mur

'dug dang / theg pa chung ngu rnam gnyis byed pa'i mi sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi nang na chos ma yin/ tshul khrims ma yin zhes zer na/ rtag par snying rje bskyed de ngan pa'i rnams theg pa chen po la yid dga'/ yid ches par bstan cing bslab pa'i

rigs na/ de la byang chub sems dpa' slar log par sangs rgyas kyi chos la nges shes bshad na de ni byang chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu la la zhig bdag gis bdag bstod cing phar smod pa dang / gzhan la bdag stod/

phar smod par ston pa/ smod pa'i rgyu/ smod pa'i rkyen byed pa/ smod pa'i chos dang / smod pa'i las byed na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can thams cad kyi skyin par sma dbab cing ngan sems pa ni bdag gis blangs te/ dge zhing legs pa ni gzhan

la sbyin pa'i rigs na la la zhig gis bdag gi legs pa ni bsnyad gzhan gyi legs pa ni bcabs te/ gzhan la rma dbab par byas na de ni byang chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu bdag ser sna che
'am/ gzhan ser sna che bar ston tam/ ser sna che ba'i rgyu byed dam/ ser sna'i chos byed dam/ ser sna'i las byed na byang chub sems dpa' ni dbul po 'ongs so cog dang / gzhan ji 'dod pa
bzhin dgos so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sems la ngan du sems shing sems la gshe ba dang / dong tshe gcig gam/ khab gcig gam/ rtswa nyag ma gcig mi ster ram/ chos 'dod pa

zhig 'ongs na tshig gcig le'u gcig /rdul tsam gyi chos kyang ma bshad la/ slar ngag ngan pas spyos te rma phab na de ni byang chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu bdag khro 'am/ mi pha log po khro bar

ston tam/ khro ba'i rgyu byed dam/ khro ba'i rkyen byed dam/ khro ba'i chos byed dam/ khro ba'i las byed na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni thams cad kyi nang na dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing 'thab cing rtsod pa med par byas la rtag par snying rje

bskyed cing bya ba'i rigs kyi/ phyir log par sems can thams cad kyi nang na sems can ma yin pa la kha ngan pas gshe zhing lag pas 'tshog pa dang / ral gri dang / dbyig pas gdab cing brdegs kyang snying brtse ma bri ste/

pha log po 'gyod cing tshig 'jam pos 'chags shing gnong bskur kyang khro ba'i mdud pa ma bkrol na de ni byang chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu la la zhig gis dkon mchog gsum la ma yin zhes zer ram/

gzhan dkon mchog gsum la ma yin zhes zer bar bstan tam/ ma yin zhes zer ba'i rgyu dang / rkyen byed dam/ ma yin pa'i chos byed dam/ ma yin pa'i las byed na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni mur 'dug dang / ma rabs kyi ngan tshig

gcig sangs rgyas kyi sgra skad ma yin zhes zer ba zhig mthong ngam thos na mdung rtse kha gsum pa sum brgyas snying la zug pa dang mtshungs na/ bdag gi kha nas ma yin zhes zer ba lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ yid ches pa'i sems

sri zhu dang mi 'gal ba'i sems bskyed pa'i rigs na/ slar log par ma rabs log pa la lta zhing ma yin zhes zer ba'i grogs byed na de ni byang chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o/ /dge zhugs spyod pa'i rnams ni byang chub

sems dpa'i so sor thar pa 'di bslabs pa'i rigs so/ /'di'i nang nas rdul phra mo tsam yang gzhig tu mi rung na tshul khrims bcu tshang bar bshig pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ la la zhig gis tshul khrims bshig pa zhig na

da ltar gyi lus la byang chub sems dpa'i sems bskyed pa'i las ma nus te/ rgyal po'i gral yang stor/ 'khor lo bskor ba'i rgyal po'i gral yang stor/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma'i gral yang stor/ g.yos shing phyogs

pa bcu dang / bskyed cing gsol ba bcu dang / chos rdo rje dang mtshungs pa bcu dang / sa bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid rtag pa'o/ /yon tan zab mo la sogs pa zad par stor nas ngan song gsum du ltung ste/ bskal pa gnyis gsum

gyi bar du pha ma dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi ming mkhan kyang mi thos te/ de bas na gcig kyang gzhig tu mi rung ngo / /khyed la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' lobs pa dang / slob pa dang / slob par 'gyur ba'i rnams tshul

khrims 'di bcu bslabs la gus par byos te rtag par gzungs su gzung ba'i rigs so/ /gsal bar ni le'u brgyad khri pa'i nang nas rgya cher bshad do/ /sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bka' stsal pa/ phas pham

pa bcu ni bshad zin to/ /ltung ba bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad ni sangs rgyas kyi bu rgyal po'i gral thob pa'i tshe dang / 'khor los bskor ba'i rgyal po'i gral thob pa'i tshe dang / blon po'i gral thob pa'i tshe dang / sngar byang chub sems

dpa'i tshul khrims mnod pa'i rigs so/ /'ung tang lha ma srin thams cad kyang rgyal po'i lus dang / blon po'i lus kyi rim gro dang / skyabs byed do/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyang dgyes so/ /tshul khrims thob zin

na sri zhu dang mi 'gal ba'i sems dang / sems la gus par byas pa'i sems dpa' bskyed de/ gral mthon po na 'dug pa'i mkhan po dang / slob dpon dang / theg pa chen po la tshangs par spyod du mtshungs pa dang /

mtshungs par mthong ba dang / las 'thun par byed pa mthong na langs te bsu la phyag 'tshal te nad dri ba'i rigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' slar dregs pa'i sems dang / le lo'i sems dang / glen pa'i sems bskyed

de ma langs/ ma bsu/ phyag ma byas te/ ji la 'ang chos bzhin du zhe sa dang / ri mo dang / bdag gi lus dang / yul mkhar dang / pho smos dang / nor rin po che bdun la sogs te nor ro cog btsongs la dgos so

cog ma sbyar te/ de ltar ma nus na ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu la la ched kar chang 'thung na chang gi nyes pa skyes te/ dge ba'i bsod nams grangs med pa stor to/ /la la zhig gis bdag gis lus dang lag gis chang snod blangs

te mi pha rol po la byin te blud na tshe rabs lnga brgya'i bar du lag pa med par 'ong na/ bdag 'thung ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/ 'di lta ste/ mi'o cog thams cad dang / sems can thams cad la chang 'thung bar bstan tu mi rung ngo / /

bdag rang 'thung ba lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ bdag ched kar 'thungs pa dang / pha rol po la bdar ba ni ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu sha ched kar zos pa dang / sha'o cog bzar mi rung ste/ zos na snying rje zhing byams pa'i rang bzhin gyi sa bon

chad pas sems can thams cad kyis mthong nas 'jigs nas spong ngo / /de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems can gyi sha bzar mi rung ngo / /sha zos pa ni sdig grangs med de sha zos na ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu dku ba

rnam lnga bzar mi rung ngo / /sgog pa dang / btsong dang / rgya sgog dang / ri sgog rnams dang / shing kun dang / 'di rnam lnga kha zas so cog gi nang du bzar mi rung ngo / /la la zhig ched kar zos na ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu sems

can thams cad kyis tshul khrims brgyad dang / tshul khrims lnga dang / tshul khrims bcu dang / rtsa ba rnam pa bzhi bshig pa dang / log pa bdun dang / gnod pa brgyad kyi tshul khrims bshig pa'i sdig byed pa mthong na mthol

tshangs byed du gzhug pa'i rigs so/ /de las byang chub sems dpa' ma bstan te mthol tshangs byed du ma bcug na/ lhan cig 'dug 'dug cing tshangs par spyod du mtshungs pa'i dge 'dun gyi rnams gcig tu tshogs te tshul khrims

bshad pa'i tshe sdig dngos su byung gis nyes pa mthol tshangs byed du chug shig /ma bcug na ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu mkhan po theg pa chen po la lhan cig tu lta ba lhan cig tu las byed pa/ dge 'dun gyi khang khyim dang /

mkhar du 'ongs pa mthong na rgyang grags stong gi lam na tshur 'ongs na ni bsu/ 'gro ba ni bskyal cing phyag 'tshal te/ bkur sti dang / ri mo dang / nyin gcig cing dus gsum du ri mo bya nyi ma gcig gi zan du gser srang gsum

gyi kha zas dang / khri stan dang / chos kyi mkhan po ci 'dod do cog dgos kyang kun sbyor te byin la rtag par chos kyi mkhan po gnyer te/ dus gsum du chos bshad de nyin gcig cing dus gsum du phyag gus par 'tshal la

khro ba'i sems dang / mya ngan gyi sems mi skye bar bgyis so/ /chos kyi phyir lus dang bsngos te chos gsol lo/ /de ltar ma byas na ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu gang la yang rung ste/ tshul khrims dang / mdo sde 'chang

ba'i khang khyim chen po'i nang na chos 'chad pa yod na byang chub sems dpa' gsar du slob pa tshul khrims kyi glegs bam khyer te/ chos kyi mkhan po'i gnas su song la/ gsol te dri zhing mnod pa'i rigs so/ /la la

zhig ri dang / tshal dang / shing gi drung dang / dge 'dun gyi sa dang / khyim gyi nang dang / chos 'chad do cog gi sar byin par byas te/ mnyan cing 'dod do/ /de'i gnas su song ste ma mnyan/ ma mnos na ltung ba'o/ /sangs

rgyas kyi bu sems ni theg pa chen po dang 'gal zhing rtag par sangs rgyas kyi yi ge dang / tshul khrims la 'dug kyang khar smra na sangs rgyas kyis bshad pa ma yin zhes zer na/ rtag par theg pa chung ngu rnam gnyis dang /

mur 'dug gi chos la lta zhing log par lta ba'o cog gi tshul khrims dang / chos kyi yi ge gzungs su bzung na ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu mi nad kyis btab bo cog rtag par rim gro byas te/ gsol la sangs rgyas dang

mtshungs par byas na dge ba'i bsod nams rnam pa brgyad kyi nang na nad pa la lta zhing gsos pa'i dge ba'i bsod nams ni bsod nams kyi dam pa'o/ /pha ma dang / mkhan po dang / dge 'dun dang / slob ma 'am/ dbang po ma tshang

ba nad do cog gis btab cing nyon mongs na kun kyang gsos te sos par bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems can la lta gshe zhing ngan sems kyis dge 'dun gyi khyim dang / yul mkhar du ma phyin pa/ dbye dang / ri lung dang /

mkhar dang / tshal na nad pa 'dug pa mthong ste ra mda' dang / rim gro ma byas na ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu ral gri dang / mda' gzhu dang / mdung dang / sta re la sogs te thab mo'i spyad mtshon cha dang / sems can gsod pa'i spyad dang

'dra ba rgya rgya mo la sogs pa 'chang du mi rung ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' ni pha ma gzhan gyis bsad kyang sha mi glan na/ sems can thams cad gsad pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ mtshon cha ched kar 'chang ba na ltung ba'o/ /'di lta bu'i

tshul khrims rnam bcu ni bslabs te/ rtag par gzungs su gzung ba'i rigs so/ /'og ma le'u drug gi nang na rgya cher bshad do/ /sangs rgyas kyis sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams la bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas kyi bu khe 'dod pa'i phyir

sems ngan pa bsams te/ nyi 'og gi yul du pho nyar 'drul ba dmag gi g.yul bshams te/ dmag bskyod nas 'thabs te sems can mang po bsad na byang chub sems dpa' dmag gi nang du song zhing phan tshun du 'drul yang mi rung

na ched kar yul gyi dgra byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de la ched kar byed pa ni ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu bla 'bangs dang / bran phos smos dang / phyugs bdag sna drug dang / gshin sgrom ro gzhug pa'i snod la sogs pa/ khe dang

tshong spogs bdag gis kyang bgyi ba'i mi rigs na gzhan la byed par bstan pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de la ched kar byed pa ni ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bus ngan sems bskyed de pha log po dge ba nges pa/ chos kyi mkhan po/

dge 'dun rgyal po/ ya rabs btsun pa la ma nyes par log pa bdun dang / pham pa bcu dang / pha ma dang / phu bo nu bo dang / gnyen pa rnam drug gi tshul khrims bshig go zhes skur na sri zhu dang mi 'gal zhing byams shing snying

rje ba'i sems bskyed pa'i rigs kyi/ de la slar log pa'i gnod pa bskyed na mi bde ba'i gnas su lhung na ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu ngan sems bskyed de/ ched kar me chen po btang la ri dang / tshal dbye dang / ri lung

dbyar zla ra ba man chad/ ston zla tha chungs yan chad/ bsregs sam/ la la zhig gis me btang ste/ gzhan gyi khang khyim dang / mkhar dang / grong dang / dge 'dun gyi khyim dang / zhing dang / bskyed shing dang / lha ma

srin dang / bla'i dkor la sogs te bdag po yod do cog gi nor rdzas bsreg tu mi rung ngo / /la la zhig gis ched kar bsregs na ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi slob ma bdag dang / mur 'dug dang /
gnyen rnam drug la sogs te/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen no cog kun kyang ci yang theg pa chen po'i yi ge dang / tshul khrims nod cing gzungs su 'dzin par bstan pa'i rigs so/ /gzhung dang lugs shes shing
byang chub sems dpa'i sems bskyed pa dang / bskyed cing gsol ba'i sems bcu dang / rdo rje'i chos kyi sems g.yo bar bstan te/ gcig nas gcig tu go rims dang / chos kyis cho ga shes par bya'o/ /

byang chub sems dpa' la byang chub sems dpas ngan sems dang / zhe sdang bskyed de/ gzhan nyan thos kyi theg pa chung ngu rnam gnyis kyi tshul khrims dang / yi ge dang / mur 'dug dang / log par lta ba'i bshad pa

bstan pa na ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu legs pa'i sems kyis sngar theg pa chen po'i go cha dang / tshul khrims dang / yi ge bslabs nas rgya cher phye nas gzhung gi ro ci bro ba shes nas byang chub sems dpa'
gsar du slob pa rgyang grags brgya stong gi lam nas theg pa chen po'i yi ge dang / tshul khrims 'dod cing 'ong ba mthong na chos kyi phyir dka' thub spyod pa chos bzhin bshad pa'i rigs so/ /dka'
thub ces bya ba ni lus bsregs pa/ lag ngar bsregs pa sor mo bsregs pa'o/ /de la lus dang / lag ngar dang / sor mo bsregs te/ sangs rgyas thams cad la yon du ma gsol na/ de'i rab tu byung

ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ma yin no/ /stag dang / spyang ki dang / seng ge ltogs pa la sogs pa dang / 'dre ltogs pa la sogs pa thams cad la lus kyi sha dang / rkang lag gtong phod par byas te/ byin la de nas
gcig nas gcig tu mthar gyis yang dag pa'i chos bshad de/ sems ni phye/ yid ni gol bar bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' bdag gso ba'i khe 'dod pa'i phyir lan glan pa'i rigs pa ni ma blan gyi/

yi ge dang / tshul khrims ri mo dang / 'bru phyin ci log tu bshad nas snga phyi med par dkon mchog gsum la 'phya zhing 'chad pa ni ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu bdag kha zas dang / nor rdzas dang / gso ba'i khe dang /

ming snyan pa'i phyir rgyal po dang / rgyal bu dang / blon po chen po la sogs pa gnyen zhes zer te/ snyems shing nan gyis nor slong la/ btsan ngag gis bsdigs te nan gyis nor dang / khe tshol lo cog gi ming ni

ngan pa mang po tshol zhes bya'o/ /gzhan la yang snying rje med cing sri zhu dang mi 'gal ba'i sems yong med par bstan pa ni ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu tshul khrims kha ton du klog pa slob pa na nyin gcig cing dus

drug tu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims bzung la/ de'i gzhung dang / don sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid shes par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi yon tan tshig gcig le'u gcig kyang mi shes par

sgyu ma'i tshig tu nus shes zer ba ni bdag la brnyas shing bslus/ gzhan la yang brnyas te chos so cog rnam pa gcig kyang mi shes par gzhan la mkhan po byed cing tshul khrims ston pa ni ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas
kyi bu ngan sems bskyed de/ tshul khrims 'dzin pa'i dge ba'i lag na pog snod khyer te/ byang chub sems dpa'i las byed pa la mthong nas phan tshun gnyis kyis bar du bar bcug ste/ 'phags pa'i

mi la brnyas ma shin byed cing ngan mi byed pa med do zhes skur te/ de lta bu ched kar byas na ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu snying rje spyad de ci 'ang mi gsad par btang ba'i las byed cing pho'o cog ni bdag gi pha yin/

mo'o cog ni bdag gi ma yin/ bdag sngan chad kyi tshe rabs la gar skyes so cog na yang de dag las ma skyes pa med pas na 'gro ba drug gi sems can bdag gi pha ma yin te/ de bsad cing zos na bdag gi pha ma
bsad do/ /gcig tu na bdag gi lus rnying pa bsad do/ /sa dang chu thams cad ni bdag gi lus snga ma yin no/ /me dang rlung ngo cog ni bdag gi gzugs kyi phyi mo yin pas rtag par gson por btang ba'i las
byed/ gar skyes gar skyes kyang sems can gsod pa mthong na thabs spyad de bdag gis 'or ba dang ra mda' byas te/ nyon mongs shing phongs pa thar bar bya'o/ /rtag par byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims

bshad de bstan bslabs nas sems can thar pa'i ra mda' bya'o/ /pha ma dang / bu pho dang nu bo zhig shi na de nyin par chos kyi mkhan po gnyer te/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims bshad na de'i bsod nams
kyis shi ba de sangs rgyas thams cad dang phrad de mtho ris su skye'o/ /de ltar ma byas na ltung ba'o/ /chos kyi rgya mo/ bam po gnyis pa ste tha ma/ 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims 'di bcu bslabs na sems
gus par gzungs su gzung ba'i rigs so/ /sdig bkru ba'i le'u'i nang nas kyang tshul khrims gcig pu gcig nas rgya che zhing gsal bar bshad do/ /sangs rgyas kyis sangs rgyas kyi bu la bka' stsal pa/

khros pa'i lan khros pas mi glan/ brdeg pa'i lan brdeg pas mi blan/ pha ma dang / phu nu bo gnyen rnam drug bsad kyang sha glan du mi rung ngo / /gzhan zhig gis bdag gi rgyal po gsad kyang sha glan du mi rung ngo / /srog

gcod cing sha glan na sri zhu'i chos dang 'gal lo/ /bran pho smos la ngag ngan pas spyos shing brdegs la nyin gcig cing las ngan pa rnam gsum spyod pa la yang sdig grangs med na ched kar log pa sna bdun gyi sdig byas pa

lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ rab tu byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' la snying rje med/ gnyen rnam drug la sogs pa'i sha blan pa ched kar byed na ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu gdod ma dang po rab tu byung ste/ ji 'ang mi shes par bdag

dbang po rno la 'dzangs par rlom zhing la la ni lo grangs rgan zhing phyug btsan snyems te/ la la rus che zhing thabs mtho ba dang / mang du shes pa dang / dbang che ba dang / nor rin po che sna bdun mang du bdog pas rgyags dregs sngan

chad chos shes pa'i mkhan po la yi ge dang / tshul khrims mi gsol/ mi nod/ chos kyi mkhan po la la ni rung chung / la la ni nas gzhon/ la la ni thabs chung / la la ni dbul/ la la ni dbang po ma tshang yang legs
pa'i chos dben pa yod de/ chos kyi yi ge dang / tshul khrims so cog zad par shes na byang chub sems dpa' gsar du slob bo/ /chos kyi slob dpon ma rig pa dang / thabs la 'phral gang du bltas shing chos

kyi mkhan po la yang dag pa'i bden pa gzhung ngo cog gsol zhing nod du ma 'ongs na ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu sangs rgyas 'das pa'i phyi na sems dge bas sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims 'dod cing nod na sangs rgyas dang /

byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyi spyan sngar bdag gi sems la yi dam bcas te/ zhag bdun gyi bar du sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar mthol tshangs byas la/ ltas bzang po mthong ba ni tshul khrims thob bo/ /ltas
bzang po ma mthong ba ni zhag bdun gnyis/ bdun gsum/ lo gcig gi bar du ltas bzang po mthong ba'i drod kyis gzung ngo / /ltas bzang po mthong nas sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs

kyi spyan sngar tshul khrims mnod do/ /ltas bzang po ma mthong na sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyi spyan sngar tshul khrims mnod kyang ming tshul khrims thob pa zhes mi bya'o/ /la la zhig gis

sngon chad byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims mnos pa'i mdun du nod na ltas bzang po mi dgos so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos kyi mkhan po gcig nas gcig tu bstan pas na ltas bzang po mi dgos te/ chos kyi

mkhan po de'i mdun du tshul khrims mnos na tshul khrims kyang thob ste gus pa'i sems skye'o/ /rgyang grags stong lam tshun chad tshul khrims sbyin nus pa'i mkhan po med la sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems

dpa'i gzugs kyi spyan sngar tshul khrims nod na ltas bzang po mthong bar dgos so/ /chos kyi mkhan po la la zhig bdag theg pa chen po'i yi ge dang / tshul khrims shes pa dang / rgyal po dang / rgyal bu dang / blon po rnams

byams shing mdza' ba snyems te/ byang chub sems dpa' gsar du slob pa chos kyi yi ge'i lugs dang / tshul khrims kyi gzhung 'drir 'ongs pa la brnyas pa'i sems dang / ngan sems dang / le lo'i sems kyis gcig pu

gcig pu nas 'dri ba'i lan ma blan na ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / tshul khrims kyi yi ge dang / theg pa chen po'i drang po'i chos/ drang por mthong ba/ drang po'i ngo bo nyid/ drang po'i chos kyi

lus kyis 'grus par slob cing spyod sgom mi nus pa rnams ni dkon mchog bdun bdun btang ste/ slar log par bltas te theg pa chung ngu rnam gnyis dang / mur 'dug gi chos dang / ma rabs kyi gzhung la bsten pa dang /

a b+hi d+harma bshad pa slob pa dang / theg pa chung ngu'i yi ge dang / 'dug par slob na de ni sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyi sa bon chad pas lam 'gog pas bsgribs pa'i rgyu rkyen gyis byang chub sems dpa'i lam ma yin no/ /de lta na

ched kar byas pa ni ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu sangs rgyas 'das pa'i phyi na chos 'chad pa bdag po byed pa dang / dge 'dun gyi khyim bdag po dang / ston cing 'phrul pa'i bdag po dang / bsam gtan du 'jug pa'i bdag

po dang / 'gro zhing 'ongs pa'i bdag po dang / de lta bu byed na byams pa'i sems bskyed la mi mdza' ste/ 'thab cing rtsod pa yang dge bar bsdum pa'i rigs so/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi nor yang dge bar bsrungs te ma

'os par mi spyad/ bdag gis bdag gi sgor bab pa dang mtshungs par bya'o/ /de la las log par mang po 'grub cing 'bad pa dang / rang nyams kyi sems kyis dkon mchog gsum gyi nor spyad na ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas

kyi bu sngan chad dge 'dun gyi khyim gyi nang na 'dug la byang chub sems dpa' dang / dge slong 'dron pa zhig phyis dge 'dun gyi khang khyim dang / mkhar dang / grong dang / rgyal po'i khyim dang / dbyar tshul du zhugs pa'i tshe dang / 'khor

gyi nang du 'ongs pa mthong na snga na 'dug pa'i dge 'dun gyis 'ong na ni bsu 'gro na ni bskyal te zas kyi bsti stang dang / khang khyim dang nyal ba'i mal cha dang / khri dang / sna sna nas sbyar te sbyin no/ /la la zhig bdag la nor med na

bdag gi lus dang / bu pho dang / bu mo dag btsongs te/ ci 'dod pa kun sbyar te sbyin dgos so/ /sbyin bdag la la zhig 'ongs te/ dge 'dun phal dang / dge 'dun gyi 'dron pa zhig gnyer te/ yon gyi nor skal ba yod

pa'i sar dge 'dun khyim bdag pos dge 'dun 'dron pa'i rnams rim gyis gnyer ba btang ste/ de las dge 'dun snga nas 'dug pas bdag 'ba' zhig gnyer bar song ste/ dge 'dun 'dron pa ma btang na dge 'dun gyi khyim gyi bdag

po sdig grangs med par thob ste byol song dang mtshungs so/ /dge sbyong ma yin shAkya'i rigs kyi sa bon yang ma yin te/ de ltar byas pa ni ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu ci yang go rims su ma bab par logs shig tu yon blangs shing

bdag gir bkur du mi rung ngo / /de lta bu'i yon gyi nor rdzas ni phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun dbang ste/ de la logs shig tu mnos shing khyer na phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun gyi nor bdag gi sgor khyer na bsod nams rnam pa brgyad dang / sangs rgyas

dang / 'phags pa rnams dang / mkhan po dang / dge 'dun dang / pha ma dang / nad pa'i rdzas bdag gis spyad kyis ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba dang / rab tu ma byung ba'i sbyin bdag gis dge 'dun gnyer

te/ bsod nams bskyed cing smon lam gsol na dge 'dun gyi nang du song na dge skos la dris te/ de ring go rims gang la bab pa gnyer na phyogs bcu'i 'phrul gyi dge 'dun 'thob bo/ /gud nas dgra bcom pa dang / byang chub

sems dpa' dang / dge 'dun lnga bcu gnyer ba bas go rims su bab pa'i dge 'dun tha mal pa gcig gnyer ba bsod nams che'o/ /de las dge 'dun gzhan gnyer ba ni mur 'dug ngan pa'i chos so/ /sangs rgyas bdun la ni

gud nas gnyer ba'i chos med do/ /sri zhu'i lam dang 'gal bas gud nas dge 'dun gnyer ba ni ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu ngan sems spyad de gso ba'i khe'i phyir pho smos kyi g.yem pa 'tshong ba'i bdag dar cing zan byed

pa dang / bdag rdung ba/ bdag 'du ba pho smos kyi mtshan lta rmi lam bzang ngan 'gro la pho zhes zer/ mo zhes zer/ log pa'i chos kyi sngags sgyu ma rang bzor zer/ dgra bslab pa'i chos byed/ dug go cog sbyor zhing byed la

dug rtsi rnam pa brgya stong byed de sbrul dug /gser dngul ma btul ba'i dug dang / byad stems la sogs pa snying rje yong med pa lta bu ched kar byas na ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu ngan sems bskyed de/ bdag gi lus

kyis dkon mchog gsum la skur ba byas te gzhan la gnyen sgyu ma smos te/ kha ni stong pa 'chad/ las ni yod pa'i las byed la/ tha mal pa'i bud med dang / skyes pa'i smyan byed cing mi tshangs par spyod par sbyor te/ ci la 'ang mi

'jigs shing chags pa med/ dus drug tu mchod ston byed pa'i nyi ma dang / lo gcig la zla ba gsum gsum mchod ston rtag tu byed pa'i tshe sems can gsod/ rkun po dang / chom po byed cing mchod ston gyi tshul khrims bshig

pa ni ltung ba'o/ /tshul khrims 'di bcu bslabs la rtag par gzungs su gzung ba'i rigs so/ /khrims gzung ba'i le'u'i nang nas kyang rgya cher mngon par bshad do/ /sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas kyi

bu sangs rgyas 'das pa'i phyi na ngan pa'i dus la mur 'dug dang / mi ngan pa'o cog dang / rkun po chen pos sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' pha ma dang mtshungs pa'i gzugs 'tshong ba mthong ngam/ chos dang tshul khrims

kyi yi ge 'tshong ba mthong ngam/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma 'tshong ngam/ gcig tu sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'tshong ba dang / la la zhig snying rje'i las la mngags pa'i 'brang nas bran pho bran mor byas pa zhig

byang chub sems dpas de lta bu mthong na byams pa'i sems bskyed de/ thabs kyis ra mda' dang / skyabs byas te gnas gnas na 'khod do cog kyang slar slob cing ston cig /sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs

dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / chos dang / tshul khrims kyi yi ge thams cad nor yod na nor gyis slus shig de ltar ma slus na ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu 'chang du mi gnang ba la mtshon cha dang / mda' gzhu 'chang ba dang /

tshong spogs byed pa dang / srang dang bre che chung 'chang ba dang / rtsa lag snyems shing mi gzhan la nor len pa dang / sems can la phrag dog byed de/ pha log po bcings drags byas pa dang / ngo so don du yod pa zhig btang byi la dang / sel byi dang /

khyi dang / phag dang / bya 'chang zhing gsor mi rung ngo / /de lta bu ched kar gsos na ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu ngan sems bskyed de pho smos la sogs pa 'thab bo cog la lta ba dmag gi g.yul dang dgra chen po byed pa la sogs pa la

bltar mi rung ngo / /yang gcig tu dung 'bud pa dang / rnga gling dang / gyim shing dang / dzeng dang / gling bu dang / kong hi'u dang / glu len pa dang / rol mo'i sgra la mnyan du mi rung ngo / /cho lo dang / mig mangs dang / par sig gi rtsed mo dang / ra 'bri

lug gi dmag gi rtsed mo dang / pho long rdob pa dang / rdo 'phen gyis rtse ba dang / bum bu la rde'u 'phen pa dang / khras byed pa dang / me long brud pa byar mi rung ngo / /rtsa tsi tsha'u dang / rgya lcang dang / phor kha rub dang / mi'i thod pa dang / de rnams

la mo gdab tu mi rung ngo / /rkun po'i than gyi pho nya la sogs pa gcig kyang byar mi rung ngo / /de ltar ched kar byas na ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu tshul khrims thub par bzung ba'i rim gro byas na 'gro nyal 'dug langs/

nyin mtshan dus drug tu tshul khrims kha ton klags na rdo rje dang mtshungs so/ /rkyal pa thogs pa mtsho chen po rgal ba dang mtshungs so/ /gcig tu na dge slong rtswas bcings pa dang mtshungs te/ theg pa chen po la dge zhing yid ches

pa'i sems rtag par bskyed la bdag gis shes par bsam pa nga ni da rung sangs rgyas su ma phyin pa'i sangs rgyas so/ /sangs rgyas kyi rnams ni sangs rgyas su phyin pa'i sangs rgyas so snyam du byang chub tu sems bskyed de bar mi chad

par sems la bsams la de skad cig gcig theg pa chung ngu gnyis dang / mur 'dug la sems kyis bsams na ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu rtag par smon lam thams cad gsol la/ pha ma dang / mkhan po dang / dge 'dun

dang / dkon mchog gsum la sri zhu che zhing yid dang mi 'gal bar smon/ rtag par mkhan po mkhas pa dang / tshangs par spyod du mtshungs pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad de rtag par bdag theg pa chen po'i yi ge

dang / khrims dang / g.yo zhing phyogs pa bcu dang / bskyed cing gso gso ba bcu dang / chos rdo rje dang mtshungs pa bcu dang / sa bcu la sogs pa bdag byed cing shes la chos bzhin du las byed par smon to/ /sangs rgyas kyi

bu tshul khrims bzung la sran thub par bya ba ni lus dang srog kyang bor te sems la sems pa'i bar mi gcad par sems bsam mo/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'di lta bu'i smon lam ma bskyed na ltung ba'o/ /

sangs rgyas kyi bu smon lam chen po bcu smon pa'i 'og tu sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims gzungs su bzung ste smon lam 'di bzhin du gdab bo/ /bdag gi lus 'di me chen po'i nang du tshig kyang rung khung zab mo dang / ral gri'i ri

la song yang rung ste dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi dam pa'i chos kyi yi ge dang / tshul khrims mthar mi zhig pa dang / nam du yang mi zhig pa bud med thams cad sogs pa mi byed par smon to/ /gcig tu smon lam 'di

ltar smon to/ /lcags bsreg pa'i dra ba dang / de lta bu rgya mo rim pa stong gis bskor te lus dkris kyang mthar yun du tshul khrims dral ba'i lus kyis dad pa'i sbyin bdag gi gos thams cad mi bgo bar smon to/ /yang gcig tu

smon lam 'di ltar smon to/ /kha 'di'i nang du lcags kyi thu lum bsregs pa dang / me chu bzhin du bab ste 'ong ba la bskal pa brgya stong gi bar du lon kyang tshul khrims bshig pa'i khas dad pa'i sbyin bdag gi zas thams cad mi

za bar smon to/ /yang gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon to/ /lus 'di me chen pos bsregs pa'i lcags kyi dra ba dang / lcags bsregs pa'i tsha ba'i steng du bsnyal kyang tshul khrims dral ba'i lus kyis dad pa'i sbyin bdag

gi khri'o cog gi steng du mi 'dug par smon to/ /yang gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon to/ /lus 'di bskal pa gcig gnyis kyi bar du mdung rtse kha gsum pa sum brgyas gtsags kyang rung ste/ mthar tshul khrims

bshig pa'i lus kyis dad pa'i sbyin bdag gi rtsi sman thams cad mi za bar smon to/ /yang gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon to/ /lus 'dis bskal pa stong gi bar du lcags kyi zangs po che tsha ba'i nang du bcug kyang rung ste/

mthar tshul khrims dral ba'i lus kyis dad pa'i sbyin bdag gi khang khyim mo cog dang / ldum ra dang / bskyed shing dang / zhing gi steng du mi 'dug par smon to/ /yang gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon to/ /lus 'di mgo nas

rkang pa'i bar du lcags kyi gtun bus brdungs te rdul phra mo bzhin du song yang khrims dral ba'i lus sems yid ches pa'i sbyin bdag gis 'grus shing gus par phyag mi 'tshal bar smon to/ /yang gcig tu smon

lam 'di ltar smon to/ /stong phrag brgya'i lcags bsregs pa'i ral gri dang / mdung rtses mig gnyis brus shing btsags kyang tshul khrims bshig pa'i sems kyis pha logs kyi kha dog bzang po la mi lta bar smon to/ /

yang gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon to/ /lcags kyi smyung bu stong phrag brgyas bskal pa gcig gnyis kyi bar du lus kyi chu ba dang / rna ba'i rtsa bar btsugs kyang tha mar khrims dral ba'i sems kyis rol mo snyan pa la

mi mnyan par smon to/ /yang gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon to/ /bskal pa stong phrag brgya'i bar du ral gris sna bcad cing gzhogs kyang khrims dral ba'i sems kyis spos so cog la mi snom par smon to/ /yang gcig tu

smon lam 'di ltar smon to/ /bskal pa brgya stong gi bar du lce ral gris bcad gtubs kyang khrims dral ba'i sems kyis mi'o cog gi kha zas gtsang ma'o cog la mi bza' bar smon to/ /yang gcig tu smon lam 'di
ltar smon to/ /sta re rnon pos lus bcad gtubs kyang mthar khrims dral ba'i sems kyis reg pa'i bzang po la mi brkam mi chags par smon to/ /yang gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon to/ /sems can no cog

sangs rgyas su yod par smon to/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'di lta bu'i smon lam ma bskyed na ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu rtag par dus gnyis su sbyangs pa'i yon tan pa dgun dang / dbyar bsam gtan du 'jug pa dang / tshul

khrims su 'jug pa so shing dang / sran phye dang / chos gos gsum dang / ril ba dang / lhung bzed dang / gding ba dang / gsil byed dang / pog phor dang / chu tshags dang / lag phyis dang / gri dang / gtsub shing dang / gtsub stan dang /

smang tsher dang / tha gu'i khri dang / dar ma dang / khrims dang / sangs rgyas kyi bu sbyangs pa'i yon tan spyad pa'i cha grong rgyu ba'i tshe 'gro zhing 'ongs na rgyang grags brgya stong du 'gro na yo byad bcwa brgyad rtag par lus dang mi 'bral te/

sbyangs pa'i yon tan pa ni dpyid zla ra ba tshes bcwa lnga nas dpyid zla tha chungs tshes bcwa lnga'i bar du'o/ /ston zla 'bring po'i tshes bcwa lnga nas dgun zla ra ba nya'i bar du dus gnyis su yo byad bcwa brgyad lus dang mi 'bral/ dper na

bya'i 'dab ma dang 'dra'o/ /de ste gso sbyin gyi nyi ma la gsar du slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams zla ba phyed phyed cing kha ton du phas pham pa bcu dang / ltung ba bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad kyi khrims kha ton du lhogs shig /

de ste khrims klog pa'i tshe sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gzugs kyi spyan sngar gzugs dang / gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar mi gcig gis kha ton klags la gcig gis 'thol

tshangs bya ste/ gcig gam gnyis sam gang yang rung ste/ stong brgya de yang mi gcig gis kha ton klog go/ /kha ton klog pa ni sa mthon po la 'dug la nyan pa ni dma' ba la 'dug go/ /so so nas chos gos tshal bu dgu pa

dang / lnga pa dang / bdun pa bgos te tshul du 'jug pa ni gcig nas gcig tu chos bzhin du'o/ /sbyangs pa'i yon tan spyod pa'i tshe bgegs yod cing mi bde ba'i nang du ma 'gro cig /yul gyi bgegs dang / rgyal po mi srun pa

dang / sa mtho dma' dang / rtsi shing zab mo dang / dbyar seng ge dang / stag dang / spyang ki dang / chu ste rlung gi bgegs dang / rkun po chom po dang / sbrul gdug pa'i lam la sogs te/ bgegs yod do cog thams cad du sbyangs

pa'i yon tan pa 'gror mi rung ngo / /de la ched kar song na ni ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu chos 'di bzhin du rim pas 'khod cig /tshul khrims sngar nos pa ni sngar 'dug shig /tshul khrims phyis nod pa ni phyi nas 'dug

shig /rgan gzhon mi lta/ dge slong pho dang / dge slong mo dang / ya rabs dang / btsun pa dang / rgyal po rgyal bu dang / nyung rum dang / bran pho smos la sogs pa tshul khrims sngar nos pa ni sngar 'dug shig /phyis

nos pa ni phyis go rims bzhin du 'dug shig /mur 'dug ngan pa dang / mi glen po bzhin du rgan yang rung / gzhon yang rung / snga med phyi med pa'i go rims med pa ni g.yung po bran gyi chos so/ /nga sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi nang na ni snga ma ni

steng du 'dug /phyi ma ni 'og tu 'dug go/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni chos bzhin du go rims su ma 'khod na ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu rtag par sems can no cog bstan cing bcos te/ dge 'dun gyi khang khyim byed cing

ri dang / tshal dang / ra ba dang / zhing la sangs rgyas kyi rten gyi khang pa byas la dbyar dgun du tshul dang / bsam gtan du 'jug pa'i gnas dang / gtsang ma'i 'chags 'dzugs su gzhug pa'i rigs so/ /de la byang chub sems

dpa' sems can no cog gi phyir theg pa chen po'i chos dang / tshul khrims kyi yi ge bkrol bshad na nam na tsha byung ba dang / yul gyi bgegs dang / dgra'i bgegs dang / pha ma dang / phu nu bo dang / mkhan po la sogs pa thog

ma shi ba'i dus dang / bdun gsum gyi nyi ma dang / bdun bzhi'i nyi ma dang / bdun lnga'i nyi ma dang / bdun bdun gyi nyi ma la de'i phyir theg pa chen po'i yi ge dang / tshul khrims bkrol bshad de/ mchod ston byas te/ dge ba'i

bsod nams thob par gsol cig /'gro 'ongs kyang gson po'i mtsho bsod nams byed pa la me chen pos bsregs/ chu chen pos khyer/ rlung nag po chen pos gru bus pa dang / gtsang po dang mtsho chen po'i dgra'i bgegs
la sogs te/ sdig go cog bgegs dang lan gyis na mtshams med pa bdun/ bgegs brgyad/ lag sgril/ rkang sgril ltung dang / lcags dang lus bcings drags te/ g.yem zhing khro ba mang po dang / blun zhing

glen pa mang po dang / na tsha'i mang po'i dgra zus na kun gyis kyang theg pa chen po'i chos kyi yi ge dang / tshul khrims kha ton klags te dgrol bshad do/ /byang chub sems dpa' gsar du slob pa 'di bzhin ma byas na ltung ba'o/ /

tshul khrims 'di dgu bslabs la gus par rtag par gzungs su zung shig /snyoms pa'i chos kyi le'u las kyang rgya che zhing mngon par bshad do/ /sangs rgyas kyis sangs rgyas kyi bu la bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas kyi bu mi

la tshul khrims shig sbyin na bye brag dbye zhing gdam du mi rung / rgyal po dang / rgyal bu dang / blon po chen po dang / blon po phal dang dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma dang / pho g.yem mo g.yem dang / gzugs kyi

gnam bcwa brgyad dang / 'dod pa'i khams kyi gnam drug dang / dbang po med pa dang / dbang po rnam gnyis yod pa dang / nyung rum dang bran pho smos dang lha ma srin la sogs te/ thams cad kun khrims mnod du rung ngo / /

lus la chos kyi gos bgo ba rnams ni kha dog bsgyur bar ston la chos dang 'thun par gyis shig /kha dog ser po sngon po nag po dmar po/ mal gos yan chad kha dog bsgyur ro/ /lus la gos bgo'o cog tshos te kha dog

sgyur cig /yul lo cog gi nang na mi'i gos su bgo ba la/ dge slong ngo cog gi gos ni tha mal pa'i gos dang mi mthun no/ /thog ma tshul khrims sbyin pa'i tshe mkhan pos dri ba khyed tshe 'di la log pa bdun gyi sdig byas sam zhes dris shig /

chos kyi mkhan po byang chub sems dpa' ni log pa bdun byas pa la tshul khrims sbyin du mi rung ngo / /log pa bdun zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi lus la khrag phyung ba dang / pha ma dang mkhan po dang slob dpon bsad pa dang / lus kyi tshul khrims

gtsang ma bshig pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba pa'i 'phags pa gsod pa yin te/ 'di rnam bdun tshang bar byas te bsgribs pa'i tshul la tshul khrims sbyin du mi rung ngo / /gzhan ni thams cad kyang tshul khrims sbyin du rung ngo / /rab tu byung

ba'i chos ni rgyal po la yang phyag mi 'tshal/ pha ma la yang phyag mi 'tshal/ gnyen pa rnam pa drug la yang zhe sa mi bya/ lha ma srin la yang phyag mi 'tshal lo/ /chos kyi mkhan po skad shes pa zhig rgyang grags stong gi lam nas 'ongs te/

khrims gsol ba zhig yod na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi mkhan pos ngan sems dang khro ba'i sems bskyed de/ sems can no cog la tshul khrims ma byin na ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu la bstan bcos te/ yid ches pa'i sems g.yo

bar bya na byang chub sems dpas gzhan tshul khrims bstan pa'i chos kyi mkhan po byas te/ tshul khrims mnod du 'ong ba'i mi zhig mthong na sngar mkhan po slob dpon gnyer du thong shig /mkhan po gnyis kyis kyang khyed la bdun gyis

bsgribs pa'i sdig yod dam dris shig /de la yang tshe 'di la bdun gyis bsgribs pa'i sdig yod na mkhan pos tshul khrims sbyin pa mi rigs so/ /bdun gyis bsgribs pa'i sdig med na tshul khrims sbyin du rung ngo / /la la zhig gis tshul khrims bcu

bshig pa zhig yod na mthol tshangs byed du chug shig /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i zhal sngar nyin mtshan drug tu pham pa bcu dang / ltung ba bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad kyi tshul khrims kha ton du klags la dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas la sems

thag pa nas phyag 'tshal ba'i tshe ltas bzang por bya dgos so/ /de la nyi ma bdun dang / bdun gnyis dang / bdun gsum dang / lo gcig tshun chad ltas bzang po mthong dgos so/ /ltas bzang po zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas gshegs te/ spyi bo la

byugs te/ 'od mthong ba dang / me tog mthong ba dang / ltas ci yang rung ba bzang po mthong na mod la sdig 'byin to/ /de la ltas bzang po med na mthol tshangs su zin kyang mi phan te/ de'i tshe lus kyis ni tshul khrims mi thob bo/ /lo dang nyi mas bstan te

spogs te byas la/ ltas 'od byung ba dag mthong na tshul khrims mnod du rung ngo / /la la zhig gis ltung ba bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad bshig pa ni mthol tshangs byas pa'i mod la 'byung ste/ bdun gyis bsgribs pa dang mi mtshungs so/ /

de bas na tshul khrims ston pa'i mkhan pos chos 'di'i nang nas kyang gcig nas gcig nas khrel na mkhan po bya'o/ /theg pa chen po'i yi ge dang / tshul khrims yang ba dang / lci ba dang / yin pa dang ma yin pa'i gzugs dam pa

mi shes na gzhung gi mchog bden pa dang / snga ma'i rang bzhin gyi sa bon dang / da ltar bskyed cing gso ba'i rang bzhin dang / gtan mi rlag pa'i rang bzhin dang / chos kyi sa bon gyi rang bzhin dang / drang po'i
rang bzhin dang / de'i nang nas rtogs pa dang / dpyod pa'i rang bzhin dang / phyi nang gi bsam gtan bcu'i yal ga la sogs te chos kyis las bya'o/ /cho ga dang tshul khrims dang / chos kyi yi ge
'di gcig nas gcig khong du ma chud de/ byang chub sems dpa' g.yo ba'i khe dang / ming snyan pa 'dod pa'i phyir slob ma la khe brkam pas/ ngan pa btsal te mi shes pa la sgyu mar chos dang /
tshul khrims kyi yi ge kun shes so/ /zhes zer zhing yon len pa'i bdag la yang bslus shing brnyas/ gcig tu na gzhan la yang bslus shing brnyas te/ de lta bus mi

la tshul khrims byin na ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu gso ba'i khe 'dod pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims ma mnos pa'i mdun du mur 'dug dang / ma rabs kyi mdun du sangs rgyas stong gi tshul khrims chen

po 'di bshad du mi rung ngo / /log par lta ba'i mdun du mi rung ngo / /rgyal po ma gtogs pa gzhan su'i mdun du yang bshad du mi rung ngo / /mi ngan pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims ma mnos pa ni ming byol song

zhes bya'o/ /gar skyes gar skyes kyang dkon mchog gsum mi mthong zhing rdo shing dang mtshungs sems med de ming chos log pa zhes bya'o/ /log pa la lta ba'i rnams ni shing dum dang mtshungs so/ /byang chub

sems dpa' de lta bu ngan pa'i mdun du sangs rgyas rabs bdun gyi tshul khrims bshad de bstan na ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu sems yid ches te rab tu byung na/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims dam po mnos la ched kar

sems bskyed de/ 'phags pa'i tshul khrims bshig na sbyin bdag go cog gi yon blang du mi rung ngo / /gcig tu ni rgyal po'i khab kyis ris la yang 'gror mi rung / rgyal po'i chu la yang 'thung du mi rung ste/ 'dre chen po lnga stong

gis rtag par de'i mdun bcad nas 'dre na re dgra chen po khyim dang / mkhar dang / yul gyi nang du 'ongs so zhes zer te/ de rnams kyis khor mor mi de'i rjes phyags so/ /'jig rten na re yang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi
nang du 'gro'o zhes zer te mig gis mthong du 'ong mi dga'o/ /tshul khrims bshig pa ni byol song dang mtshungs/ shing dum dang mtshungs te/ drang po'i tshul khrims bshig na ltung ba'o/ /
sangs rgyas kyi bu sems gcig tu brtul te rtag par gzungs su bzung ste kha ton du yang klog go/ /lpags pa
