sa ga dang ni mon gre yang / /gsum pa zhes ni bya ba yin/ /tha skar de la sgrub par 'gyur/ /chu stod zla ba gnyis pa ste/ /snron dang rgyal zhes bya ba yang / /de la bde bar byed par 'gyur/ /khrums smad ces ni bya ba ni/ /
grogs dang grogs po mchog tu 'gyur/ /drug po 'di dag lag dang ni/ /gro bzhin snar ma gsum pa yin/ /smin drug ces ni bya ba yang / /byi bzhin dang ni dbo yin no/ /'dir ni khron pa sa rir gyur/ /me lha
yin te sa gas bshad/ /gling bzhir tshes ni bcwa lnga la/ /khyod spyod yud tsam bzhi bcu lngas/ /'gro bar byed cing bya ba ni/ /chen po mi zad pa yis gnas/ /zhag ni bcwa lnga tham par yang / /nad pa
yang ni thar bar gyis/ /su zhig kyang ni khyod kyi bur/ /dag par rjes su skye 'gyur ba/ /gzi brjid dang ni dpal dang ni/ /longs spyod dga' ba 'bar bar 'gyur/ /bud med brnab sems shin
du srungs/ /de skye'i rgyu skar lag yin no/ /de'i las rgyu skar mon gre yin/ /mchu dang tha skar chu stod rgyu/ /smin drug ces ni bya ba la/ /de ni 'chi bar 'gyur ba yin/ /byi bzhin dang ni
dbo yang ni/ /'dir ni rgud par byed pa yin/ /khrums stod dang ni snron dang ni/ /nab so yang ni gsum pa ste/ /lha 'tshams zhes ni bya bar yang / /de ni phun sum tshogs byed yin/ /nab so khrums stod
snrums dang ni/ /nam gru skag ni bde byed yin/ /gre dang yang ni chu smad dang / /gsum pa bra nye sgrub pa yin/ /mdza' bo dang ni mdza' mchog tu/ /de dag der ni 'gyur ba yin/ /nag pa snar ma mon grum
bzhin/ /mgo gnyis me bzhi gro bzhin yang / /'dir ni de bdun lho phyogs kyi/ /kha 'dzin phrugs shes bya ba yin/ /'phags pa shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i sde nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mdo/

bam po bcu pa/ mdza' shes kyi ni lha mo yis/ /yar gyi ngo yi tshes gcig la/ /'gro bar byed pa'i go rims kyang / /lha mtshams la ni smras pa yin/ /bra nye tshes ni bcwo lnga yi/ /nyin par yang ni yud tsam

yin/ /mtshan mo yang ni de tsam ste/ /nyin mtshan gcig la bra nye yin/ /chu yi lha mo de yang ni/ /nyin dang mtshan du mnyam pa ste/ /yud tsam sum bcu tham pa ste/ /de'i longs spyod thang cig shog /rgyal po legs brtan

snying rje spangs/ /'thun par yul 'khor skyong ba bzhin/ /de bzhin du ni mi zad pa'i/ /bra nye yang ni 'gro bar shog /'dzam gling 'di la ston par shog /de bzhin khyed cag thams cad kyis/ /de la dmod pa bor

bar gyis/ /de bzhin 'gro la bstan par gyis/ /kun gyis smras pa/ de bzhin rtag tu gyur par shog /mi zad pa yi bya ba gyis/ /khyod kyis spyod pas gang skye ba/ /mi yi thu bo mi zad 'gyur/ /de yi mngal 'jug chu

stod yin/ /bra nye la ni skyes pa'i mi/ /'chi ba'i tshe na lha mtshams dang / /khrums stod ces ni bya ba yin/ /'di la mkhas pas brtag bya ste/ /sa ri mon gru ma yin gzhi/ /dmag 'gro rtsod pa'i gnas dag gis/ /

bya spang spu gri'i las mi bya/ /snar ma me bzhi byi bzhin ni/ /rgud byed dgra rnams khyod kyis gzhom/ /khyod kyis las ni che chung kun/ /gre yi tshe na bya bar gyis/ /chu smad dang ni dbo yang ni/ /phun sum tshogs par byed

par byed par brjod/ /sman rnams brten bya sbyin dang dul/ /gos dang rgyan kyi bya ba'ang brjod/ /mgo dang nag pa zhes bya dang / /gro bzhin mchu ni bde bar byed/ /sa ga nab so mon gre ste/ /de dag lam 'jug sgrub pa yin/ /skag

dang snrums shes bya ba dang / /tha skar dang ni mchu dang gre/ /grogs po mchog tu 'gyur ba yin/ /bsgrub tu mi rung las kyang gyis/ /'di tshe khri bzhon gos dang mal/ /mdza' bo rnams la'ang brtsam par bya/ /nyi ma'i bu ni

mig dmar te/ /drang srong chen po der dpang btsugs/ /bcu gnyis khyim dus gnas de nas/ /der yod las 'thun grib gom drug /der ni dus kyang mnyam pa yin/ /nyin dang mtshan kyang mtshungs pa yin/ /de yod tha

skar mtshan mo gang / /lha mtshams nyin par gnas pa na/ /khyod kyis nga ni spang bar gyis/ /mkha' la spyod cing khyod kyis ston/ /gling bzhi pa ni mgu bya'i phyir/ /'di ni ji ltar lhags pa bzhin/ /ngas 'dir gang zhig yang

dag brjod/ /lha yi drang srong kun dga' gyur/ /de bzhin khyod ni kun du song / /smin drug de bzhin me yi lha/ /bdag nyid gling bzhi der gnas shing / /khyod kyis me bzhin myur bya gyis/ /yud tsam sum bcur tshal
du song / /der gang mi yi zas 'byung ba/ /dam pa'i grags dang longs spyod kyang / /zla nya khyod 'dir yang legs rdzogs/ /de ltar nga yis thob pa yin/ /zhag bzhi tham par nad pa ni/ /myur ba kho
nar thar bar gyis/ /mngal du 'jug pa me bzhi bsrungs/ /chu stod 'chi bar byed pa yin/ /skag khrums stod smad nab so dang / /mon gre 'phel bar byed pa yin/ /khyod kyis bya ba 'di spongs shig /

dmag dang rtsod pa'i gnas 'gro dang / /spu gri yi ni las rnams so/ /gro bzhin dang ni nag pa dang / /mgo ni rgud par byed pa yin/ /lag dang dbo ni 'dir 'joms byed/ /byed pa'i bya ba 'di gyis shig /che dang chung

ba gang ci yang / /snar mas phun sum tshogs par byed/ /byi bzhin dang ni nag par bcas/ /der ni bya ba gang rtsi dang / /gom pa sbyin pa gos dang mal/ /der ni rgyan gyis brgyan par bya/ /lag ni bde bar byed pa
ste/ /mon grum dang ni sa ri yang / /gsum po dag ni de dag yin/ /lam du 'jug pa 'ang de dag yin/ /rgyal dang lha mtshams khrums stod ni/ /las dag sgrub par byed pa yin/ /mchu snrubs skag dang khrums

smad dang / /de dang de rnams drag byed grogs/ /skal bzang bag ma gtong dang bzhon/ /mal yang der ni de bya ste/ /khyim dang dus shes bya ba dang / /gza' rnams bdag gis brjod pa yin/ /de ltar bdag gis dus
kun brjod/ /khyod ci drang srong lha mi dga'/ /bdag gis byed de bshad pa bzhin/ /lha dbang drang srong 'khor dang bcas/ /mi yis thal sbyar 'di skad smras/ /'byung po kun la phan pa khyod/ /'gro ba la

ni skyob pa khyod/ /de ltar shes mnyam ji bzhin khyod/ /yang smras pa/ rnga bong can gyi drang srong ste/ /snar ma chu yi rigs kyang yin/ /chu yi lha mo khyod yin na/ /gsum par yang ni 'gro bar gyis/ /

byed pa chung dang 'bring yin zhing / /bzhi bcu rtsa lnga tham pa yin/ /yud tsam du ni khyod kyis 'gro/ /dug dang sha ni zas yin no/ /khyod la spyod par byed pa yis/ /gang dag mi rnams skye 'gyur ba/ /de dag
phyug cing chos dang ldan/ /zhag lnga nad pa myur du gsos/ /de 'dir khyod kyis bstan par gyis/ /byi bzhin nam grus mngal du 'jug /'chi ba snrums dang mchu bzhin te/ /rgyal dang lha mtshams

khrums stod 'phel/ /dmag 'gro bag ma gtong ba yi/ /gnas nas 'gro bar byed pa dang / /nyo tshong dang ni bzo byed pa/ /de 'dra ba yi bya ba spongs/ /sa ri mon grum de dag 'dir/ /rgud byed dgra 'dir gzhom par bya/ /

me bzhi las kyi rgyu skar yin/ /che chung thams cad 'dir gyis shig /mgo dang nag pa gro bzhin te/ /de dag phun sum tshogs par byed/ /rtsi byed na yang de dag sten/ /der byin gos rgyan sna tshogs sgrogs/ /nab so dang ni sa ga dang / /

mon gre bde bar byed pa ste/ /de dag la ni lam du 'jug /snron ni sgrub pa byed pa yin/ /skag ces bya ba khrums smad ni/ /drag po'i las dag byed pa yin/ /chu stod chu smad tha skar dang / /bra nye khrums stod chu smad mdza'/ /dbos

ni skal ba bzang po sbyin/ /brtson pa dang ni bzhon pa dang / /mal dang khri ni bsham pa yang / /'di la bya ba de 'jug go/ /yang smras pa/ 'gro ba bzhi dang ldan par ni/ /mgo la khyod ni gnas par 'gyur/ /mi yi las bya myur du

sgrubs/ /yud tsam sum bcu 'gro bar gyis/ /zhag brgyad nad pa myur du gsos/ /khyod zas tshon sha zla ba'i lha/ /der ni skyes dgu gang dag skye/ /dpa' zhing 'byor bar 'gyur ba yin/ /khyab 'jug bden 'di shin du bsrungs/ /

de byed ji bzhin nga yis bshad/ /gro bzhin tha skar mngal du 'jug /chu gnyis gre dbo 'chi bar byed/ /snron gyi tshe ni bya ba 'phel/ /skag dang gzhan bcas thob par byed/ /lam ring rtsod dang gnas nas 'gro/ /bya ba de 'dra

spang bar gyis/ /nab so rgud par byed pa ste/ /mon gre sa ga bzhin du shes/ /gsang ba'i gnas bzhin brtsam par gyis/ /brdzun g.yo dmangs kyis 'joms par byed/ /nag pa las kyi rgyu skar te/ /'di la che chung thams cad

rtsom/ /lag ni phun sum tshogs par byed/ /mon grum sa ri gzhan thob byed/ /'dir ni sman dang sbyin 'dul bzhon/ /rgyan dang gos kyang thob par byed/ /rgyal dang lha mtshams khrums stod bde/ /de dag lam du shin du 'phrod/ /

snrums dang nam gru mchu sgrub byed/ /'di la gtum po'i las kyang bya/ /me bzhi dgra zin bra nye dang / /snar ma dbyer med chu gnyis bzhin/ /skal bzang bag ma gtong dang bzhon/ /mal kun 'dir ni byed du chug /

lag lha drag mos de tshe smras/ /tshes lnga la ni khyod gnas te/ /yud tsam bcwa lnga khyod 'gro byed/ /khyod kyi zas ni mar sar te/ /drag cing mi zad sdang byed sgrub/ /nad pa yang ni zhag bcu yin/ /khyod la spyod
pas mi gang skye/ /srid pa gsum du mi zad 'gyur/ /nor tshol byed cing chom pos 'chi/ /khyod kyi sbyor bas de yin no/ /mon gru snrums la mngal du 'jug /chu dang nam grus 'phel bar 'gyur/ /dbo yi

tshe na 'chi bar byed/ /chu gnyis bra nye ji bzhin no/ /skye dang 'jig dang 'phel ba yi/ /byed pa de ni spong bar gyis/ /lha mtshams dang ni khrums stod der/ /byed pa bstan nas rgud par byed/ /sa ri las kyi rgyu

skar yin/ /byed pa chung ngu thams cad 'jug /sa ga dang ni mon gre dang / /nab so phun sum tshogs par byed/ /khrums smad par ni bde byed yin/ /snron dang skag ni lam na mnyam/ /gre ni sgrub par byed pa

ste/ /chu stod tha skar gsum pa yin/ /me bzhi'i bar gzhan grogs mchog ste/ /smin drug nag pa gro bzhin dang / /byi bzhin bag ma gtong dang bzhon/ /mal dang skal ba bzang por sgrub/ /nyi ma'i lha mo nab

sos smras/ /tshes drug la yang gnas par 'gyur/ /sbrul sha khyod kyi zas su shog /las kyang drag por bya bar gyis/ /yud tsam bzhi bcu rtsa lngar 'gro/ /'dir ni nad pa zhag brgyad yin/ /khyod spyad su yang

mi nang skye/ /zhing pa longs spyod ldan par 'gyur/ /rta dang glang chen zad par 'gro/ /nab sos mngal du 'jug par 'gyur/ /'di ni mon gre'i zas yin te/ /smin drug la ni 'chi bar byed/ /khrum smad rgud par byed pa yin/ /

skag snron las kyi rgyu skar yin/ /sa ga brtul zhugs bstan pa yin/ /rgyal yang phun sum tshogs par byed/ /lag dang lha mtshams zhes bya dang / /khrums stod kyang ni bde bar byed/ /mchu dang nam gru bzhin du ste/ /de dag

lam du zhugs na bzang / /bra nye chu smad gre dang dbo/ /sgrub byed nag pa gro bzhin dang / /sa ri snar ma mgo mon grum/ /mi yi nang khyod grogs mchog 'gyur/ /rgyal 'dir lha mo phur bu khyod/ /tshes bdun gnas khyod yud sum

bcu/ /'gro byed bu ram sbrang rtsi zas/ /chos ldan byed chud myur du sgrub/ /nad kyang zhag lnga kho na ste/ /khyod spyod su yang mi nang skye/ /tshul dga' chos smras mdun 'don blon/ /zhing ring bag gtong de dag 'jig /khrums

stod dang ni lha mtshams la/ /mngal du 'jug par byed pa ste/ /dbo dang yang ni tha skar dang / /chu smad la ni 'phel bar byed/ /snar ma nag pa gro bzhin 'chi/ /gsum po de dag shes par gyis/ /mchu snrums nam gru de dag gsum/ /

rgud byed mkhas pas shes par gyis/ /lha mtshams byed pa thams cad la/ /las dag gi ni rgyu skar te/ /mkhas pas shes pa kho nar gyis/ /snron ni phun sum tshogs par byed/ /khrums smad skag gis thob byed gre/ /chu

stod tha skar gsum po bde/ /me bzhi sgrub min drug dbyer myed/ /de bzhin mkhas pas gsum shes gyis/ /sa ri grogs dang grogs mchog ste/ /mgo dang lag dang mon grum bzhin/ /sa ga dang ni mon gre yang / /

don ni 'bras bur bcas pa yin/ /sbrul gyi lha mo skag 'dir smra/ /tshes brgyad la ni khyod gnas kyis/ /yud tsam bcwa lngas khyod 'gro byed/ /god pa'i sha ni zas yin no/ /'gro ba'i nang du gshin rje yi/ /byed

pa mi zad khyod gnas kyis/ /nyin der khyod spyod su mir skye/ /khro zhing sdig pa can du 'gyur/ /shin du mi sdug tshul khrims nyams/ /chos gos gding ba zad 'gyur zhing / /khrums smad ces bya rab mchog la/ /

mngal du 'jug pa ston par byed/ /me bzhi smin drug 'chi bar byed/ /mgo snrums gre ni ro myangs pas/ /rgud byed chu stod tha skar dang / /snron ni las kyi rgyu skar yin/ /snrums dang nam gru mchu zhes pa/ /gsum po phun sum

tshogs par byed/ /bra nye bde byed gre dbo dang / /gro bzhin mchu gnyis khyod thos sgrub/ /nag pa snar ma mchu gnyis dang / /mon gre lha mtshams sa ga dang / /lag dang nab so de dag grogs/ /khrums stod kyang ni de bzhin no/ /

gshin rje'i yi dags lha mos smras/ /tshes dgu la ni khyod gnas shing / /yud tsam sum bcur nyin 'tshan tu/ /til gyi sbyar thug zas yin no/ /sems can byed pa chung 'bring sgrubs/ /zhag brgyad tham par nad pa sos/ /gong

ma'i bra nye su mir skye/ /bsod nams byed par bshad pa yin/ /brdzun srog shin du yun rings bsrungs/ /snrums ni las kyi rgyu skar yin/ /'dir yang nam grus mngal du 'jug /sa ga la yang 'chi bar byed/ /lag ces bya ba

kho na dang / /mon gre yang ni gsum pa yin/ /snar ma dang ni nag pa dang / /gsum pa gro zhin 'dir dga' byed/ /dbo dang bra nye rgud byed yin/ /chu smad phun sum tshogs par byed/ /tha skar dang ni gre dang ni/ /mchu gnyis 'phel

bar byed pa yin/ /gsum po de dag shes par gyis/ /me bzhi dang ni byin zhin dang / /smin drug kyang ni bde bar byed/ /sa ri de la sgrub pa yin/ /mgo gnyis dang ni mon grum bcas/ /de gsum rje grogs shes par gyis/ /snron

rgyal lha mtshams chu stod dang / /nabaso lhag par zla ba'ang yin/ /skal ldan lha mo gre yis smras/ /tshes bcu la ni khyod gnas shig /bil ba mar sar zas yin te/ /yud tsam sum bcur khyod kyis 'gro/ /'gro 'dir

bya ba chung ngu bsgrubs/ /zhag bdun nad pa khyod spyod pas/ /su zhig mir skye dri dga' 'dod/ /gos dang rgyan dag 'dod pa yin/ /bye brag phyed rnams su srung ba/ /tha skar la ni mngal 'jug 'gyur/ /nab sos 'chi mgo

zin ro myang / /'phel byed smin drug rgud par byed/ /me bzhi'ang mkhas pas mngon shes gyis/ /gre zhes bya dang bra nye dang / /chu smad ces ni bya ba gsum/ /phun sum tshogs byed shes par gyis/ /'di ni sa ga

mon gre yang / /sgrub yin lag la'ang bde ba ste/ /snar ma nag pa gro zhin nyin/ /mkhas pas grogs gnyis shes par gyis/ /rnam pa drug tu 'gyur ba ni/ /skag dang nam gru rgyal dag dang / /snrums dang snron zhes bya ba dang / /

khrums gnyis gang yin 'dir yin no/ /lhag par yang ni de bzhin du/ /thams cad kyang ni bgrang bar gyis/ /mkhas pa blo gros ldan pa yis/ /rang gi thams cad shes par gyis/ /gre dbo nyi ma'i lha mos smras/ /

tshes ni bcu gcig khyod gnas kyis/ /yud tsam bzhi bcu rtsa lnga yis/ /khyod ni rnam par grol bar gyis/ /mgo yis las ni chung ngus kyang / /sa bon thob cing bskyed bya ste/ /zhag bcur nad pa zhi bar gyis/ /
khyod spyad skye dgu gang 'byung ba/ /blun zhing bsnyen gnas gnas pa'i dang / /sbyin bral 'gro la sdang mi sdug /dug gis 'chi bar 'gyur ba ste/ /de yi mngal 'jug bra nye shog /nam gru mon
gre 'phel bar byed/ /lag ces bya dang sa ga dang / /snron zhes bya ba gsum pa ste/ /de dag 'chi bar byed pa yin/ /khrums smad dang ni rgyal yang 'dir/ /rgud byed yin par shes par gyis/ /snar ma dang

ni chu smad kyang / /de'i las rgyu skar shes par gyis/ /me bzhi'ang phun sum tshogs byed cing / /byi zhin dang ni smin drug kyang / /bde bar byed pa'i gnas yin te/ /mon gru dang ni mgo sgrub byed/ /nabaso
khrums stod lha mtshams 'dir/ /mkhas pa bzhin du'ang shes par gyis/ /grogs dang grogs mchog tha skar te/ /mchu dang nam gru skag dang bcas/ /snrums dang khrums stod ces bya ba/ /drug po
de dag nam mkha' la/ /nyi ma'i lha mo lhan cig par/ /mkhas pa yis ni shes par gyis/ /bcu gnyis khru myur rgyal byed mkha'i/ /dpal las bya bar myur mi zad/ /yud tsam sum bcur 'gro bar
gyis/ /sems can rnams la phan par byin/ /e ma khyod zas lham mchu gsher/ /zhag lnga nad pa myur du gsos/ /der gnas skye dgu gang skye ba/ /dbang phyug gtso bo nor ldan yin/ /chom rkun

rnams ni 'dul byed mchog /sbyin dang dul bar byed pa yin/ /mchog sbyin rnam pa sna tshogs kyi/ /mchod sbyin byed par 'gyur ba yin/ /byang chub kyi ni yan lag bdun/ /go 'phang srung bar byed pas na/ /de yi

grags pa mngal 'jug kyang / /skag ces bya ba kho na yin/ /lha mtshams 'chi bar byed pa ste/ /de yi 'phel byed nabaso yin/ /khrums stod ces ni bya ba yang / /las kyi rgyu skar dbyer med pa'o/ /sa ri mon
grum 'dir rgud byed/ /'dir ni mgo yang gsum pa yin/ /phun sum tshogs byed 'dir gro bzhin/ /sa ri snar ma'ang gsum pa yin/ /mon gre bde bar byed pa ste/ /'dir ni sa ga lag gsum pa/ /snron dang

rgyal yang sgrub pa ste/ /'dir ni khrums smad gsum pa'ang yin/ /grogs dang grogs mchog 'di drug ste/ /chu stod mchu dang tha skar dang / /chu smad ces ni bya ba dang / /gre dang bra nye 'chi bar byed/ /dga' byed lha mo
nag pas smras/ /khyod mkha' myur song yud sum bcur/ /mi zad las byed myur gnas shig /yan lag rmas pa'ang khyod kyis bza'/ /zhag drug nad pa myur du gsos/ /khyod la gnas pas skye dgu skye/ /

glu dang rol mo'i sgra mkhas 'gyur/ /sbyin dga' 'dod spyod mkhas la sdug /snar ma de yi mngal 'jug yin/ /tha skar zhes ni bya ba dang / /mchu ni 'chi bar byed pa ste/ /chu stod ces bya gsum pa'ang yin/ /
khrums smad 'phel bar byed pa ste/ /snron dang rgyal ni gsum pa'ang yin/ /de yi las kyi rgyu skar ni/ /gro bzhin yin gyi bgrang bar gyis/ /'dir ni mon gre rgud par byed/ /sa ga 'dir lag gsum pa'ang
yin/ /mgo ni phun sum tshogs byed 'dir/ /sa ri mon grum gsum pa'ang yin/ /'dir yang lha mtshams bde bar byed/ /mgo zhes kyang ni bya ba dang / /khrums stod ces ni bya ba dang / /skag kyang 'dir ni

sgrub pa yin/ /grogs dang grogs mchog snrums nam gru/ /'dir drug chu smad smin drug dang / /bra nye dang ni dbo dang yang / /sa bon gre dang sa ri ste/ /pha mas 'dir smras gling bzhi bar/ /mkha' la khyod song tshes
bcu bzhir/ /khyod spyod 'gro ba'i gling bzhi bar/ /lnga yud drag byos khyod song shig /me tog nas shin zas yin te/ /zhag

lngar nad pa myur du gsos/ /khyod spyad skye dgu su skye ba/ /rtsis pa 'byor rnyed khro bar 'gyur/ /'dir ni rgyu skar khro sdang g.yo/ /snar ma me bzhi rgud par byed/ /'dir ni smin drug byin zhin dang / /

gsum pa dbo ni phun sum tshogs/ /sa ga dang ni nabaso dang / /gsum pa khrums stod sgrub pa yin/ /'dir bde nag pa mgo mon grum/ /rnam pa drug ni mdza' bo yin/ /nam gru snron mdza' tha skar dang / /mchu

snrums de dag mchog tu mdza'/ /byi bzhin tshangs pa'i lha mos smras/ /tshes drug mkha' la khyod yud song / /mi zad bya ba 'byung bya'i phyir/ /mar sar yang ni khyod zo shig /khyod la sems can su gnas pa/ /
dpa' zhing sran thub 'byor rgyal gtso/ /yul 'khor grong 'joms dgra thul ba/ /dbo la de ni mngal du 'jug /de la 'phel byed 'chi ba med/ /de yi rgyu skar kun grogs mchog /gro bzhin khyab 'jug lha srong

smras/ /nga'i g.yas tshes bdun 'dir khyod song / /sum bcu'i yud sha bu ram zas/ /'phrog byed bya ba chung ngu sgrubs/ /khyod gnas skye dgu su skye ba/ /mkhas par byed pa'i mchog yin te/ /grogs skyong rnams kyis

mchod pa yin/ /'dir de me bzhis mngal 'jug yin/ /rgyal zhes bya dang lha mtshams dang / /khrums stod la ni 'phel bar byed/ /mchu snrums gro bzhin 'chi bar byed/ /snar ma las kyi rgyu skar yin/ /sa ri mon gre lag

rgud byed/ /mon grum mgo zhes bya ba dang / /nag pa phun sum tshogs par byed/ /khrums stod nabaso sa ga bde/ /nam gru nabaso snron skag sgrub/ /rnam drug grogs dang grogs mchog ste/ /smin drug chu smad de dag yin/ /de gnyis

gsum pa dbo yang yin/ /mon grum drang srong nor lhas smras/ /tshes brgyad yud tsam sum bcur khyod/ /bzhir song las chung khyod khu 'thung / /der ni nad btab lo gcig gsos/ /khyod gnas skye dgu su skye ba/ /khro zhing rnyed

gos dus kyang spangs/ /nang mis yongs skor mchod sbyin bsrungs/ /'dir de'i mngal 'jug nag pa yin/ /gre dang bra nye 'chi bar byed/ /chu stod gsum par bgrang bar gyis/ /snron skag nam gru 'phel bar byed/ /sa ga nab so

khrums stod rgud/ /sa ri dang ni mon gre dang / /lag ni phun sum tshogs par byed/ /las kun gnyen gyis shin du bsrung / /de yi mngal 'jug skag yin no/ /mon gre zhes ni bya ba dang / /lag ni 'chi bar byed pa ste/ /me bzhi dang ni

mon gre dang / /snar ma 'phel bar byed pa yin/ /nam gru de las rgyu skar yin/ /bra nye dang ni chu smad dang / /gre zhes kyang ni bya ba yang / /gsum pa yin te rgud par byed/ /chu stod mchu dang tha skar ni/ /phun sum tshogs byed nag pa dang / /
mon grum mgo ni sgrub par byed/ /byi zhin dbo ni bde bar bsgrags/ /rnam drug grogs dang grogs mchog yin/ /khrums stod khrums smad nab so 'dir/ /rgyal zhes bya dang lha mtshams dang / /sa ga 'dir ni

smras pa yin/ /chu stod gzhi yi lha mos smras/ /tshes bzhi'i 'tshams khyod mkha' la song / /n+ya gro d+ha ni zas yin te/ /yud tsam sum bcur 'gro bar byed/ /gdab mo chu yi las phyir yin/ /bad kan gyur nad chung bar

'gyur/ /khyod spyod skye dgu der su skye/ /chos gnas brtson thos longs spyod ldan/ /mkhas pa dag dang phrad pa yin/ /bya ba kun la mkhas pa yin/ /de skye'i rgyu skar 'dir mchu yin/ /'dir las rgyu skar tha skar yin/ /nag pa mgo dang mon grum

'phel/ /sa ga khrums stod nab so ni/ /'dir yang 'chi bar byed pa yin/ /dbo ni 'dir yang rgud par byed/ /smin drug byi zhin gsum pa'ang yin/ /'di ni phun sum tshogs byed gre/ /bra nye chu smad gsum pa'ang yin/ /

khrums dang sa ri mon gre bsgrub/ /me bzhi snar ma gro zhin bde/ /grogs dang grogs 'bring rnam drug ste/ /nam gru rgyal dang lha mtshams skag /snron dang 'dir ni khrums smad yin/ /khrum smad drang srong kun lhas smras/ /tshes

lngar bzhi bcur lnga yud 'gro/ /khyod chung bsdu byar khyod zas mngar/ /zhag bdun nad gsos skye ba bsrung / /khyod spyod skye dgu su skye ba/ /bu ldan yin zhing nad kyang med/ /grogs mang rab tu 'byor pa ste/ /mngal

du 'jug pa'ang chu stod yin/ /mon gre dang ni lag dang ni/ /sa ri kho nas 'phel bar byed/ /khrums smad dang ni lha mtshams dang / /rgyal yang 'dir ni 'chi byed yin/ /gshin rje'i lha mo la mgos smras/ /rgyal zhes bya

dang lha mtshams dang / /khrums smad bde bar byed pa ste/ /tha skar mchu snrums sgrub pa yin/ /dbo zhes kyang ni bya ba dang / /chu smad smin drug grogs kyang byed/ /snar ma byi zhin rtsis nas kyang / /gsum pa me bzhi
grogs mchog yin/ /mon gre bra nye'i lha mos smras/ /gling bzhi'i mkha' la khyod song shig /yud tsam bcwo lngar zho mar zo/ /zhag bdun nad gsos las kyang chung / /'dir khyod gnas pas skye dgu skye/ /

khro bar byed cing med pa yin/ /chu bran la ni bsrung bar gyis/ /mngal 'jug 'dir ni sa ri yin/ /tha skar mchu snrums 'phel bar byed/ /chu smad ces ni bya ba dang / /smin drug 'chi bar byed pa ste/ /dbo yang gsum par shes par

bya/ /khrums smad rgyal dang lha mtshams ni/ /rgud byed lag las rgyu skar yin/ /khrums stod nab so sa ga ste/ /de dag phun sum tshogs par byed/ /snron skag nam gru bde bar byed/ /gre dang chu stod bra nye sgrub/ /gro zhin mgo dang

me bzhi dang / /snar ma byi zhin grogs mchog grogs/ /khrums stod drang srong gis smras khyod/ /lan chung g.yo byed yud sum bcur/ /bcu bzhi tshes gling bzhi 'dir song / /sha sran khyod zo me tog bsnams/ /der ni sems can

gang dag skyes/ /gya gyu g.yo rkun blun zhing 'thab/ /ri dgas srog gcod yud sum bcur/ /nad pa myur du thar byed cing / /skye dgu de dag dmag rkun dang / /rgyud sgra rtag bsrungs sa ga yang / /'dir mngal 'jug yin bra nye

dang / /chu stod gsum pa gre 'dir 'phel/ /snar ma byi zhin shi sos byed/ /thams cad bya phyir nab so lag /rgud byed nam gru snron skag bzhin/ /phun tshogs khrums smad lha mtshams rgyal/ /tha skar mchu snrums
'dir bde byed/ /smin drug chu dbo gsum pa sgrub/ /mon gru mgo dang nag pa grogs/ /grogs mchog mon gru lag sa ri/ /khrums smad nyi ma'i lha mo khyod/ /bcu gcig tshes la mkha' la song / /yud

tsam bzhi bcu rtsa lngar song / /ri dgas sha gtor zhag bdun rims/ /khyod spyad skye dgu su skye ba/ /glu dang gar mkhas nor 'bru mang / /rab tu rig pa'i pha rol phyin/ /'dir ni chos kyi sbyin pa byed/ /lha mtshams

'phel byed smin drug dang / /chu smad 'chi bar byed pa ste/ /nag pa mgo dang gro zhin dang / /rgyal de'i las kyi rgyu skar yin/ /snrums dang tha skar mchu rgud byed/ /nam gru snron skag 'dir phun tshogs/ /me bzhi byi zhin sgrub pa ste/ /

bde bar byed pa chu stod gre/ /bra nye dang ni nag pa dang / /sa ri mon grum lag yin no/ /nab so dang ni sa ga dang / /mon gre gsum pa grogs mchog yin/ /drang srong lha mo rgyal smras khyod/ /mi yi 'jam chung bya ba'i phyir/ /bcu bzhi'i

tshes yud sum bcur song / /gtor ma bu ram mun pa srungs/ /zhag ni nyi shur khyod bsrung bas/ /skye dgu skye 'dzangs nor 'bru ldan/ /sbyor dang rab sbyor bya ba dang / /dbyig rnams dpag tu med pa'ang yin/ /de yi mngal 'jug snron

yin te/ /me bzhi snar ma byi zhin 'phel/ /sa ri mon gru lag 'chi byed/ /las kyi rgyu skar 'dir skag yin/ /dbo dang chu smad smin drug bde/ /gro zhin nag pa snar ma sgrub/ /chu stod gre bra nye rgud byed/ /tha skar mchu snrums

phun tshogs byed/ /nab so sa ga mon gre grogs/ /rgyal dang lha mtshams grogs mchog ste/ /khrums stod drang srong gis smras pa/ /dri za'i lha mo yud sum bcur/ /tshes ni bcu bzhir khyod song shig /byung bya'i

gtor ma zan dron sha /'dir zhag nyi shu lnga nad yin/ /srog ldan 'bras dkar brgya yis bsrungs/ /khyod spyad skye dgu su skye ba/ /sman sbyor byed pa sman pa yin/ /glu gar rol mo'i sgra mkhas 'gyur/ /'dir de'i

mngal 'jug snrums yin no/ /nag pa mgo dang gro zhin 'phel/ /nab so mon gre lag 'chi byed/ /skye 'chi 'phel nyo tshong lam 'gyed/ /thal mo 'dreg mkhan las rtag spongs/ /smin drug gre dbo chu smad gnyis/ /

rgud byed 'dir ni dgra pham byed/ /khyod kyis las dag che chung byas/ /mchu dang gre 'di brtan phun tshogs/ /chu stod dang ni bra nye dang / /gsum pa khrums smad bde bar byed/ /me bzhi snar ma bde bya'i phyir/ /gsang ba'i

lam du 'gro ba yin/ /lag dang mon grum sa ri sgrub/ /drag po'i las rnams kun gyis shig /rgyal dang lha mtshams khrums stod grogs/ /bya ba skal bzang 'dir chud za/ /skag snron grogs mchog brten pa ste/ /

khrums smad 'dir yang gsum pa yin/ /skal ba bzang dang bzhon pa dang / /mal dang shin du brtan par gyis/ /drug bdun de dag las bzhin dang / /sna tshogs mkhas pas shes nas su/ /sngon gyi bya ba bzhin du gyis/ /gshin

rje'i lha tshe bcu bzhir song / /zla nya zla ba rangs pa'i tshe/ /smin drug kyang ni 'gro bar gyis/ /lha dang mi dang drang srong rnams/ /byed pa gang gis sngar bstan bzhin/ /zhag ni sum bcu zla ba rangs/ /nyin dang mtshan ni mnyam pa ste/ /

yud tsam bcwa lnga bcwa lnga yin/ /grib ma'i gom drug 'dir kun 'khor/ /tha skar gyis ni mtshan mo thob/ /nyi ma'i mdun na lha mtshams te/ /lho phyogs su ni nyi ma 'khor/ /zhing gi dkyil 'khor mig dmar yin/ /gnyi bu lha srong

rab spro byas/ /khyod kyis zla ba 'di la ni/ /rtswa dang lag 'gro gnod sbyin dang / /sdig pa las sogs bsrung bar gyis/ /cha dang char ni dus bzhag par/ /sdig pa zhes bya khyod phan song / /phyogs dang phyogs su las bzhag par/ /

khyod ni yang dag phan par song / /mi mthun 'thun dang 'phel 'di yin/ /'gro ba la ni phan pa yi/ /rjes su 'thun pa bdag gis su/ /dang por bsdu ba byas 'di yin/ /de nas drang srong rnga bong gis thams cad la thal mo rab tu

sbyar te 'khor la go bar byed cing smras pa/ 'di ltar bdag gis go rims dang po dang / mtshan mo dang / nyin mo dang / zla ba dang / zla ba phyed dang / rgyu skar dang gza' dang / dus dang / khyim dang / gnas dang / 'gro bar byed pa

dang / 'khor ba dang / 'gro ba dang / mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / rnam par shes pa de bzhin du da ltar yang bstan cing rnam par gzhag na/ ci khyed cag 'di ltar rnam par gzhag pa dang gdags par rgyu skar dang / gza'

yongs su mgu ba la rjes su yi rang bar byed dam/ 'on te ma yin/ de nas de nyid kyi tshe lha ma yin dang / mi dang / drang srong dang / lha dang / lag 'gro dang / mi'am ci'i tshogs thams cad kyis thal mo rab tu sbyar ba btud

nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye khyod ni lha thams cad kyi bla ma/ lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'gro ba'i nang na gtso bo/ mtshungs pa med par mkhas la mngon par rtogs pa'i snying brtse bas bskal pa pha rol dran pa'o/ /

sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod pa'o/ /dpal thams cad phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /dus gsum thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa yin te/ 'di lta bu'i mtshan mo dang /

nyin mo dang / skad cig dang / rgyu skar dang / gza' dang / zla ba dang / zla ba phyed 'dogs par byed pa'i ye shes de lta bu yod pa'i sems can de lta bu su yang lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i nang na med pa yin no/ /ji ltar khyod kyis da

ltar btags pa bzhin du bdag cag thams cad kyis der dad pa byin pa yin/ rjes su yang yi rang ngo / /legs ldan legs so/ /sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir rgyu skar dang / gza' dang / khyim dang / dus kyi tshogs

kyis yongs su bskor ba'i zla ba gnyis pa la yang gdags par gyis shig /drang srong rnga bong gis rab tu smras pa/ bdag gi rgyu skar smin drug brjod/ /zla ba nya tshe zla rangs 'gyur/ /ston zla tha chungs zhes bya ba/ /'di ni rab tu

brjod pa yin/ /mtshan mo yang ni yud tsam cig /yongs su skor te slar ldog byed/ /bra nye dang ni smin drug kyang / /lan gnyis yongs su 'khor bar byed/ /de bas rgyu skar thams cad kyang / /phyir zhing 'jug

par byed pa ste/ /snar ma gcig pu'ang zla ngo der/ /tshes gcig la ni mkha' la 'gro/ /ji ltar sngar bya bshad pa bzhin/ /de bzhin khyod kyis skye dgu srungs/ /de tsam mgo tshes gnyis la 'gro/ /de tsam lag tshes gsum la 'gro/ /tshes bzhi la yang

nab so ste/ /rgyal yang tshes ni lnga la 'gro/ /tshes drug la ni skag gis tshigs/ /mchu yang tshes ni bdun la srung / /tshes brgyad la ni gre yin te/ /tshes dgu la ni dbo 'gro byed/ /me bzhi'ang tshes ni bcu la 'jug /nag
pa'ang tshes bcu gcig la 'gro/ /sa ri'ang tshes bcu gnyis la gnas/ /tshes bcu gsum la'ang sa ga ste/ /tshes bcu bzhi la lha mtshams yin/ /tshes bcu lnga la de bzhin snron/ /'di ni zla ba phyed du

bshad/ /yar gyi ngo la snrums sgrub ste/ /tshes gcig la ni skye dgu srung / /tshes gnyis la ni chu stod yin/ /tshes gsum la ni chu smad yin/ /tshes bzhi la ni byi zhin srung / /tshes lnga la ni gro zhin yin/ /

tshes drug la ni mon grum tshigs/ /tshes bdun la ni chu lha yin/ /tshes brgyad la ni khrums stod yin/ /tshes dgu la ni khrums smad yin/ /tshes bcu la yang nam gru srung / /de bzhin bcu gcig tshes tha skar/ /
gshin rje'i lha mo tshes bcu gnyis/ /tshes bcu gsum la me lha mo/ /tshes bcu bzhi la'ang snar ma yin/ /zla ba rangs la mgo bshad do/ /dgun zla ra ba'i zla ba 'dir/ /lha yi bla ma phur bu ste/ /

'di ni lhan cig byed par gzung / /de bas gza' zhes bya bar gshid/ /de phyir nyin mo tshes bcu bzhir/ /yud tsam mtshan mo bcu drug ste/ /smin drug gis ni mtshan mo 'thob/ /snrums kyang nyi ma'i mdun na ste/ /grib tshod gom pa brgyad yin

zhing / /nyi ma yongs su 'khor bar byed/ /lho phyogs nyi mar kha ltas 'khor/ /de bzhin dgun zla ra ba yi/ /zla 'dir khyim gzhur shes par bya/ /mar gyi ngo yi tshes gcig la'ang / /lag ni sgrub par byed pa yin/ /
tshes gnyis la ni nab so ste/ /tshes gsum rgyal du shes par gyis/ /'dir tshes bzhi la'ang skag yin te/ /mchu yang tshes ni lnga la 'gro/ /tshes drug la yang gre yin te/ /tshes bdun la
yang dbo yin bshad/ /tshes brgyad la ni me bzhi yin/ /tshes dgu la ni nag pa gnas/ /tshes bcu la ni sa ri 'gro/ /tshes bcu gcig la sa ga 'gro/ /tshes bcu gnyis la'ang
lha mtshams te/ /tshes bcu gsum la snron yin no/ /tshes bcu bzhi la'ang snrums yin te/ /tshes bcwa lnga la'ang chu stod bshad/ /

yar gyi ngo yi tshes gcig la/ /chu smad kyang ni rung ba yin/ /tshes gnyis byi zhin gro bzhin te/ /tshes gsum la ni mon gru 'gro/ /tshes bzhir mon gre 'gro rung ste/ /tshes lnga la ni khrums stod yin/ /tshes drug la yang
khrums smad yin/ /tshes bdun la ni nam gru 'gro/ /tshes brgyad la ni tha skar rung / /tshes dgur gshin rje'i lha mo yin/ /tshes bcur smin drug 'gror rung ste/ /tshes bcu gcig la'ang snar ma yin/ /
tshes bcu gnyis la'ang mgo yin te/ /tshes bcu gsum la lag kyang 'gro/ /tshes bcu bzhi la nab so ste/ /zla ba nya la rgyal yang yin/ /zla ba nya ba 'di la yang / /'dir ni rang bzhin brjod par bya/ /
lho yi phyogs su phyin nas kyang / /nyi ma yongs su 'khor bar byed/ /nyin par bcu gsum shes par gyis/ /mtshan mo bcu bdun 'gro bar byed/ /mtshan mo yang ni mchog shes gyis/ /nyi ma'i
mdun du'ang gro zhin te/ /grib tshod gom pa bcu tham pa/ /nyi ma yongs su 'khor bar byed/ /'jig rten mkhas pa rnams kyis kyang / /'dir ni spen pa'i zhing bstan pa/ /'di la mgo yin shes par
gyis/ /zla ba gsum pa rnam gzhag nas/ /zla ba mar gyi tshes gcig la/ /skag ni sgrub par byed pa yin/ /tshes gnyis la ni mchur shes gyis/ /tshes gsum la ni gre yin no/ /tshes

bzhi la ni dbo 'gro ste/ /tshes lnga la ni me bzhi 'gro/ /tshes drug la ni nag pa sgrub/ /tshes bdun la ni sa ri 'gro/ /tshes brgyad la yang sa ga ste/ /tshes dgu la ni lha mtshams yin/ /tshes bcu la ni snron 'gro ste/ /

tshes bcu gcig la snrums 'jug bya/ /tshes bcu gnyis la chu stod yin/ /tshes bcu gsum la chu smad yin/ /tshes bcu bzhi la byin zhin te/ /tshes bcwa lnga la gro zhin 'gro/ /zla ba yar gyi tshes gcig la/ /mon grum sgrub par byed pa yin/ /

tshes gnyis la ni mon gre ste/ /tshes gsum la yang khrums stod yin/ /tshes bzhi la ni khrums smad yin/ /tshes lnga la ni nam gru 'gro/ /tshes drug la ni tha skar tshigs/ /tshes bdun gshin rje'i lha mo yin/ /de bzhin tshes

brgyad smin drug ste/ /tshes dgu la ni snar ma 'gro/ /tshes bcu la yang mgo yin te/ /lag ni tshes bcu gcig la 'gro/ /tshes bcu gnyis la'ang nab so ste/ /tshes bcu gsum la rgyal yang yin/ /tshes bcu bzhi

la'ang skag yin te/ /mchu ni zla ba rab rdzogs byed/ /dgun zla tha chung rang bzhin yang / /mthar gyis kyang ni brjod par bya/ /lho yi phyogs su phyin nas kyang / /nyi ma yongs su 'khor bar byed/ /mtshan
mo bcwa brgyad shes par gyis/ /nyin par yang ni bcu gnyis yin/ /rgyal yang mtshan mo 'thob par byed/ /nyi ma'i mdun na mon gre yin/ /grib tshod kyang ni sor bcu bdun/ /nyi ma yongs su 'khor

bar byed/ /spen pa lha yi bla ma dag /zhing der rab tu brjod pa yin/ /'dir khyim bum pa mnyam pa med/ /dpyid zla ra ba mar gyi ngor/ /tshes gcig gre ni bsgrub par byad/ /tshes gnyis la ni dbo yin no/ /tshes

gsum la ni me bzhi ste/ /tshes bzhi'i bar du nag pa yin/ /tshes lnga la ni sa ri ste/ /tshes drug la ni sa ga yin/ /tshes bdun la ni lha mtshams te/ /tshes brgyad la ni snron yin no/ /tshes dgu la ni snrums

yin te/ /tshes bcu la ni chu stod yin/ /tshes bcu gcig la chu smad yin/ /tshes bcu gnyis la byi zhin te/ /tshes bcu gsum la gro zhin yin/ /tshes bcu bzhi la mon grum ste/ /tshes bcu lnga la mon gre yin/ /

de ni zla ba phyed yin no/ /zla ba yar gyi tshes gcig la/ /khrums stod ces ni bya ba yin/ /tshes gnyis la ni khrums smad yin/ /tshes gsum la ni nam gru ste/ /tshes bzhi la ni tha skar yin/ /tshes lnga la ni bra nye yin/ /tshes drug la

ni smin drug te/ /tshes bdun la ni snar ma yin/ /tshes brgyad la ni mgo yin te/ /tshes dgu la ni lag yin no/ /tshes bcu la ni nab so ste/ /tshes bcu gcig la rgyal yin no/ /tshes bcu gnyis la skag yin te/ /tshes bcu

gsum la mchu yin no/ /tshes bcu bzhi la gre yin te/ /zla rangs tshes bcu lnga la dbo/ /'dir ni dpyid zla ra ba yis/ /rang bzhin yang ni brjod par bya/ /byang phyogs su ni kha ltas te/ /nyi ma yongs su 'khor
bar byed/ /nyin par bcu gsum shes par gyis/ /mtshan mo bcu bdun 'gro bar byed/ /mchus kyang mtshan mo 'thob par byed/ /nyin par khrums stod 'gro bar byed/ /grib tshod sor ni bcu gnyis su/ /nyi ma

yongs su 'khor bar byed/ /zhing der lha yi bla ma yang / /rnam par gnas pa kho nar ni/ /bshad pa yin te 'dir yang ni/ /der ni mtshan mo 'byung ba yin/ /dpyid zla 'bring po'i zla ngo yi/ /dang por tshes gcig

me bzhi ste/ /tshes gnyis la ni nag pa yin/ /tshes gsum la ni sa ri yin/ /tshes bzhi la ni sa ga ste/ /tshes lnga la ni lha mtshams yin/ /tshes drug la ni snron yin no/ /tshes bdun la ni snrums yin no/ /tshes brgyad la ni chu stod yin/ /
tshes dgu la ni chu smad yin/ /tshes bcu la ni byi zhin te/ /tshes bcu gcig la gro zhin yin/ /tshes bcu gnyis la mon grum ste/ /tshes bcu gsum la mon gre yin/ /tshes bcu bzhi la khrums stod yin/ /

tshes bco lnga la khrums smad yin/ /de ni zla ba phyed yin te/ /zla ba yar gyi tshes gcig la/ /nam gru tshes gnyis tha skar te/ /tshes gsum la ni bra nye yin/ /tshes bzhi la ni smin drug ste/ /tshes lnga la ni snar ma

yin/ /tshes drug la ni mgo yin te/ /tshes bdun la ni lag yin no/ /tshes brgyad la ni nab so ste/ /tshes dgu la ni rgyal yin no/ /tshes bcu la ni skag yin no/ /tshes bcu gcig la mchu yin no/ /tshes bcu

gnyis la gre yin te/ /tshes bcu gsum la dbo yin no/ /tshes bcu bzhi la me bzhi ste/ /tshes bcu lnga la nag pa yin/ /dpyid zla 'bring po kho na yi/ /rang bzhin yang ni brjod par bya/ /byang gi phyogs su kha

ltas te/ /nyi ma yongs su 'khor bar byed/ /'dir ni phyis kyang yud tsam dag /yongs su 'khor bar shes par byed/ /yud tsam yang ni re re zhig /nyin mtshan dag la 'jug par byed/ /nyin par bcu bzhi shes par gyis/ /

mtshan mo'ang bcu drug shes par gyis/ /gre dbo mtshan mo 'thob par byed/ /nyi ma'i mdun na tha skar yin/ /grib tshod sor brgyad nyi ma 'khor/ /nyi ma'i bu ni mig dmar te/ /gza' rno shin du mi zad yin/ /khyim

lug la ni yang dag gnas/ /dpyid zla tha chungs mar gyi ngo'i/ /dang po tshes gcig sa ri ste/ /tshes gnyis la ni sa ga yin/ /tshes gsum la ni lha mtshams yin/ /tshes bzhi la ni snron yin te/ /tshes lnga la ni snrums

yin no/ /tshes drug la ni chu stod yin/ /tshes bdun la ni chu smad yin/ /tshes brgyad la ni byi zhin te/ /tshes dgu la ni gro zhin yin/ /tshes bcu la ni mon grum ste/ /tshes bcu gcig la mon gre yin/ /tshes bcu

gnyis la khrums stod yin/ /tshes bcu gsum la khrums smad yin/ /tshes bcu bzhi la nam gru ste/ /tshes bcwa lnga la tha skar yin/ /de ni zla ba phyed yin te/ /zla ba yar gyi tshes gcig la/ /bra nye sgrub par byed pa yin/ /

tshes gnyis la ni smin drug ste/ /tshes gsum la ni snar ma yin/ /tshes bzhi la ni mgo yin te/ /tshes lnga la ni lag yin no/ /tshes drug la ni nab so ste/ /tshes bdun la ni rgyal yin no/ /tshes brgyad la ni skag yin te/ /

tshes dgu la ni mchu yin no/ /tshes bcu la ni gre yin te/ /tshes bcu gcig la dbo yin no/ /tshes bcu gnyis la me bzhi yin/ /tshes bcu gsum la nag pa ste/ /tshes bcu bzhi la sa ri yin/ /zla rangs tshes ni

bcwa lnga la/ /sa ga yin te sa ga yi/ /go rims brjod bya byang phyogs su/ /kha bltas nyi ma yongs su 'khor/ /mtshan mo mnyam mtshungs rnam pa ste/ /bcu lnga bcwa lngar bshad pa yin/ /nag pas mtshan mo 'thob par

byed/ /nyin par yang ni smin drug yin/ /grib tshod dag kyang gom pa drug /nyi ma yongs su 'khor bar byed/ /lha min bla ma pa ba sangs/ /'dir yang zhing zhes gdags pa yin/ /khyim glang yin te mkhas rnams kyis/ /

zla ba bdun po bshad pa yin/ /dbyar zla ra ba mar gyi ngo'i/ /dang po tshes gcig lha mtshams sgrub/ /tshes gnyis la ni snron yin te/ /tshes gsum la ni snrums yin no/ /tshes bzhi la ni chu stod yin/ /tshes lnga la ni chu smad yin/ /tshes drug

la ni byi zhin yin/ /tshes bdun la ni gro zhin yin/ /tshes brgyad la ni mon grum ste/ /tshes dgu la ni mon gre yin/ /tshes bcu la ni khrum stod yin/ /tshes bcu gcig la khrum smad yin/ /tshes bcu gnyis la nam gru ste/ /tshes bcu gsum la

tha skar yin/ /tshes bcu bzhi la bra nye yin/ /tshes bcwa lnga la smin drug ste/ /de ni zla phyed zla ba yar/ /tshes gcig la ni snar ma sgrub/ /tshes gnyis la ni mgo yin te/ /tshes gsum la ni lag yin no/ /tshes

bzhi la ni nab so ste/ /tshes lnga la ni rgyal yin no/ /tshes drug la ni skag yin te/ /tshes bdun la ni mchu yin no/ /tshes brgyad la ni gre yin te/ /tshes dgu la ni dbo yin no/ /tshes bcu la ni me bzhi ste/ /

tshes bcu gcig la nag pa yin/ /tshes bcu gnyis la sa ri ste/ /tshes bcu gsum la sa ga yin/ /tshes bcu bzhi la lha mtshams te/ /tshes bcu lnga la snron yin no/ /dbyar zla ra ba'i rim brjod bya/ /byang phyogs
kha ltas nyi ma 'khor/ /'phel byed nyin par bcu drug tu/ /shes bya mtshan mo'ang bcu bzhi yin/ /sa gas mtshan mo 'thob par byed/ /nyi ma'i mdun na mgo yin no/ /grib tshod gom pa bzhi yin te/ /

'di ni yongs su 'khor bar byed/ /der zhing gza' lhag nyi ma'i bu/ /'jam por byed pa'i gza' yin no/ /sbyor ba'i khyim yin nyin par 'gro/ /brgyad pa yin par brjod pa yin/ /dbyar zla 'bring po'i tshes gcig

la/ /snrums ni sgrub par byed pa yin/ /tshes gnyis la ni chu stod yin/ /tshes gsum la ni chu smad yin/ /tshes bzhi la ni byi zhin te/ /tshes lnga la ni gro zhin no/ /tshes drug la ni mon grum ste/ /tshes bdun la ni mon gre yin/ /

tshes brgyad la ni khrums stod yin/ /tshes dgu la ni khrums smad yin/ /tshes bcu la ni nam gru ste/ /tshes bcu gcig la tha skar yin/ /tshes bcu gnyis la bra nye ste/ /tshes bcu gsum la smin drug yin/ /tshes bcu bzhi

la snar ma ste/ /tshes bcwa lnga la mgo yin no/ /de ni zla ba phyed yin te/ /zla ba yar gyi tshes gcig la/ /lag ni sgrub par byed pa yin/ /tshes gnyis la ni nab so yin/ /tshes gsum la ni rgyal yin no/ /tshes bzhi la ni

skag yin no/ /tshes lnga la ni mchu yin no/ /tshes drug la ni gre yin no/ /tshes bdun la ni dbo yin te/ /tshes brgyad la ni me bzhi yin/ /tshes dgu la ni nag pa ste/ /tshes bcu la ni sa ri yin/ /tshes bcu gcig
la sa ga ste/ /tshes bcu gnyis la lha mtshams yin/ /tshes bcu gsum la snron yin te/ /tshes bcu bzhi la snrums yin no/ /zla nya zla bar chu stod yin/ /bdag gis dbyar 'bring rim brjod bya/ /byang
phyogs bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor bltas/ /nyi ma yongs su 'khor bar byed/ /nyin par yud tsam bcu bdun te/ /mtshan mo yang ni bcu gsum yin/ /snron gyis kyang ni mtshan mo 'thob/ /nyi mar bcas na
nabs so yin/ /grib tshod gom pa gnyis yin te/ /nyi ma yongs su 'khor bar byed/ /zla ba zhes bya zhing yin te/ /lag dang yang dag ldan pa yin/ /'di khyim sbal pa zhes bya ba/ /zla ba dgu par

bshad pa yin/ /dbyar zla tha chungs mar ngo yi/ /tshes gcig la ni chu smad sgrub/ /tshes gnyis byi zhin gro bzhin te/ /tshes gsum la ni mon grum yin/ /tshes bzhi la ni mon gre ste/ /tshes lnga la ni khrums stod yin/ /tshes drug la ni

khrums smad yin/ /tshes bdun la ni nam gru ste/ /tshes brgyad la ni tha skar yin/ /tshes dgu la ni bra nye ste/ /tshes bcu la ni smin drug yin/ /tshes bcu gcig la snar ma yin/ /tshes bcu gnyis la mgo yin no/ /tshes

bcu gsum la lag yin no/ /tshes bcu bzhi la nab so yin/ /tshes bcu lnga la rgyal yin te/ /de ni zla ba phyed yin no/ /zla ba yar gyi tshes gcig la/ /skag ni sgrub par byed pa yin/ /tshes gnyis la ni mchu

yin no/ /tshes gsum la ni gre yin te/ /tshes bzhi la ni dbo yin no/ /tshes lnga la ni me bzhi ste/ /tshes drug la ni nag pa yin/ /tshes bdun la ni sa ri ste/ /tshes brgyad la ni sa ga yin/ /tshes dgu la ni
lha 'tshams te/ /tshes bcu la ni snron yin no/ /tshes bcu gcig la snrums yin te/ /tshes bcu gnyis la chu stod yin/ /tshes bcu gsum la chu smad yin/ /tshes bcu bzhi la byi zhin te/ /zla ba

rangs la gro bzhin no/ /bdag gis dbyar tha'i rim brjod bya/ /de bzhin byang gi phyogs su ni/ /nyi ma gdong phyed bltas te 'khor/ /nyin par bcwa brgyad thob nas kyang / /mtshan mo yang ni bcu gnyis te/ /chu stod kyis ni

mtshan mo 'thob/ /nyi ma'i mdun na mchu yin no/ /grib tshod gom pa phyed yin te/ /nyi ma yongs su 'khor bar byed/ /'dir zhing nyi ma ldan pa yin/ /sas kyang gzer ni gtong bar byed/ /'dir khyim seng ger shes par

gyis/ /zla ba bcu po bshad pa yin/ /ston zla ra ba mar gyi ngo'i/ /dang por tshes gcig mon grum sgrub/ /tshes gnyis la ni mon gre ste/ /tshes gsum la ni khrums stod yin/ /tshes bzhi la ni khrums smad yin/ /tshes lnga la ni

nam gru ste/ /tshes drug la ni tha skar yin/ /tshes bdun la ni bra nye ste/ /tshes brgyad la ni smin drug yin/ /tshes dgu la ni snar ma ste/ /tshes bcu la ni mgo yin no/ /tshes bcu gcig la lag yin te/ /tshes

bcu gnyis la nab so yin/ /tshes bcu gsum la rgyal yin te/ /tshes bcu bzhi la skag yin no/ /tshes bcu lnga la mchu yin te/ /de ni zla ba phyed yin no/ /zla ba yar gyi tshes gcig la/ /gre ni sgrub par byed pa ste/ /

tshes gnyis la ni dbo yin no/ /tshes gsum la ni me bzhi ste/ /tshes bzhi la ni nag pa yin/ /tshes lnga la ni sa ri ste/ /tshes drug la ni sa ga yin/ /tshes bdun la ni lha mtshams te/ /tshes brgyad la ni

snron yin no/ /tshes dgu la ni snrums yin te/ /tshes bcu la ni chu stod yin/ /tshes bcu gcig la chu smad yin/ /gro bzhin byi bzhin tshes bcu gnyis/ /tshes bcu gsum la mon grum ste/ /tshes bcu bzhi la mon

gre yin/ /zla ba nya ba'i zla rangs la/ /khrums stod ces ni bya ba yin/ /bdag gis ston zla ra rim brjod/ /lho phyogs nyi ma'i 'khor lo ldog /nyin par yang ni bcu bdun te/ /mtshan mo yang ni bcu gsum yin/ /
gro zhin gyis kyang mtshan mo 'thob/ /nyi ma'i mdun na gre yin te/ /grib tshod dag kyang gom pa gnyis/ /nyi ma yongs su 'khor bar byed/ /zla bu gza' lhag ces bya ba/ /der ni zhing la yang dag gnas/ /

der khyim bu mo bzhag pa ste/ /zla ba bcu gcig bdag gis bshad/ /ston zla 'bring po mar gyi ngo'i/ /dang por tshes gcig khrums smad sgrub/ /tshes gnyis la ni nam gru ste/ /tshes gsum la ni tha skar yin/ /

tshes bzhi la ni bra nye ste/ /tshes lnga la ni smin drug yin/ /tshes drug la ni snar ma ste/ /tshes bdun la ni mgo yin no/ /tshes brgyad la ni lag yin te/ /tshes dgu la ni nab so yin/ /tshes bcu la ni rgyal yin te/ /tshes

bcu gcig la skag yin no/ /tshes bcu gnyis la mchu yin te/ /tshes bcu gsum la gre yin no/ /tshes bcu bzhi la dbo yin te/ /tshes bcu lnga la me bzhi yin/ /de ni zla ba phyed yin te/ /zla yar tshes gcig nag pa sgrub/ /

tshes gnyis la ni sa ri ste/ /tshes gsum la ni sa ga yin/ /tshes bzhi la ni lha mtshams te/ /tshes lnga la ni snron yin no/ /tshes drug la ni snrums yin te/ /tshes bdun la ni chu stod yin/ /tshes brgyad la ni chu smad
yin/ /tshes dgur byi zhin gro zhin te/ /tshes bcu la ni mon grum yin/ /tshes bcu gcig la mon gre yin/ /tshes bcu gnyis la khrums stod yin/ /tshes bcu gsum la khrums smad yin/ /tshes bcu bzhi la

nam gru ste/ /zla rangs nya tshe tha skar yin/ /de ni zla ba phyed yin te/ /ston zla 'bring po'i ngo la ni/ /lo skor bdag gis brjod par bya/ /lho yi phyogs su kha ltas te/ /nyi ma yongs su 'khor bar byed/ /nyin par
bcu drug 'gro byed cing / /mtshan mo yang ni bcu bzhi yin/ /khrums stod kyis ni mtshan mo 'thob/ /nyi ma'i mdun na nag pa yin/ /grib tshod dag ni gom bzhi ste/ /nyi ma yongs su 'khor bar byed/ /
lha min bla ma pa ba sangs/ /gza' ni zhing la rnam par gzhag /'dir khyim srang zhes bya ba bzhag /zla ba bcu gnyis bshad pa yin/ /yongs su 'khor ba de yis ni/ /lo ni de ltar 'gro bar byed/ /
mig stong yang dang yang du ni/ /'dus te chos kyi phyogs la ltos/ /khyod ni shes rab gzhi yin na/ /chos ma yin pa'ang bzlog par gyis/ /chos gnas tshul khrims phun sum tshogs/ /thos phyug
mkhas pa bsam gtan pa/ /de dag khyod kyis chos gos dang / /bza' btung rnams kyis rjes su srungs/ /yang dag gnas te brgya byin gyis/ /rnga bong la ni thal sbyar nas/ /rab tu smras pa
bdag cag gis/ /bya ba yang ni bsgo bar gyis/ /smras pa/ lha yi bla ma khyod kyis su/ /rtag par tshangs par spyod pa srungs/ /rig sngags sman dang gsang sngags rnams/ /thams cad la

ni bya ba sgrubs/ /las kun drang srong zla ba dang / /zla ba chung dang zhag dang bzhi/ /bzo yi las kyi mtha' kun la/ /gtso bo yin par bkod pa yin/ /drag po dung gi sna can dang / /dgon pa dang ni lci ba ste/ /

gnod sbyin bzhi po de dag ni/ /mchod sbyin rib mar gtso bor bkod/ /rgya mtsho chu lha 'jog po dang / /rin chen skyong dang ring du 'gro/ /sa yid tshes dang zla srungs dang / /gnas thar byed pa rgya mtsho ni/ /gtso bor
gzhag ste ma dros dang / /khab kyis lus 'bigs chu lhas byin/ /ri dgas 'khrugs pa klu de bzhi/ /klu rnams kyi ni gtso bor bkod/ /khyod ni dge ba rab skyed pa/ /ne tso yi ni khyab byed
pa/ /mkhas pa zhing gi gtso bo ste/ /de 'dra ba ni ji lta bu/ /khyod ni snying po kho nas kyang / /me yi rtse mo'i gtso bo ste/ /khyod ni rlung dmar 'gul g.yo ba/ /rlung yang ba yi gtso bo yin/ /
rdo rje'i mig dang seng ge'i mig /legs mthong lag na mdung gsum thogs/ /lha mo bzhi po de dag ni/ /grong khyer gtso bor bkod pa yin/ /gong ma'i char skyes rtsibs mu khyud/ /
'khor lo spen pa gnod sbyin bzhi/ /de dag rin chen brtags pa la/ /nyo tshong byed pa'i gtso bor bkod/ /phyogs mtshams su ni bzhi yin te/ /bsrung ba'i phyir ni yang dag gnas/ /yul
'khor grong khyer thams cad du/ /bsrung ba'i phyir ni 'byung po bkod/ /drang srong dag ni thams cad dang / /lha yi tshogs dang klu rnams dang / /lha ma yin dang mi rnams kyi/ /bar

yang rjes su yi rang byed/ /lung bstan rab tu rgyal ba mchog /thub pa yi ni gtso bo ste/ /khyod ni skye dang 'gag pa dang / /zas dang ro dang me tog mchog /khyod ni dri 'phel byed pa ste/ /shu dag rdzogs byed
'bras bu'i mchog /khyod ni lam bde skyed pa ste/ /rnam par 'tshe las rgyal ba'i gtso/ /dga' bo dang ni nye dga' gnyis/ /ri bo rnams kyi gtso bor bkod/ /nor rgyas bu dang thang shing zhing / /lci

mchog mig dmar smugs byed skem/ /khyod ni dbyangs can chu yi gtso/ /khyod ni grub dang yid 'phrog pa/ /zla ba 'phrog par byed pa ste/ /bcud kyi len gyi gtso bo yin/ /gza' dang rgyu skar dus kyang yin/ /
khyim rnams thams cad rnam par gzhag /rgyal po chen po bzhi yang ni/ /skal ldan rgyur ni rnam par gzhag /lus ngan gnod sbyin rnams kyi gtso/ /grul bum rnams kyi 'phags skyes po/ /

klu rnams kyi ni mig mi bzang / /dri za rnams kyi yul 'khor srung / /thams cad kyi gling chen po bzhi/ /gling gzhan brgyad khrid thams cad du/ /drang srong rnga bong gis gang yongs su skyong ba ma bkod par
btang ba'i gnas ci yang med do/ /de ltar lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa de dag thams

cad kyis kyang legs so zhes bya ba byas par gyur to/ /drang srong rnga bong gi bya ba de la yang dag par rjes su yi rang bar gyur to/ /bya ba de ni mchod pa dang / rim gro bya bar so sor gnas par gyur to/ /de'i rjes

la shin du yun ring zhig na drang srong thub pa lam zhes bya ba byung ste/ des kyang skar ma'i dpyad rab tu byas so/ /zhag gis mi thub pa dang / shol yod pa yang bshad do/ /yang de'i tshe drang srong thub pa'i gnas rten ga la bar klu thams

cad 'dus te/ de dag drang srong skar ma la dga' ba mchog tu bla ma la gus pa dang gces par byed pa skyes te/ de la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir ci nus su brtson par gyur to/ /'phags pa 'dus pa chen po'i sde theg pa

chen po'i mdo las nyi ma'i snying po'i le'u bcu gcig pa rdzogs te/ rgyu skar gyi sbyor ba rnam par gzhag pa'i le'u rdzogs so// // 'phags pa shin du rgyas pa chen po'i sde nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mdo/ bam po

bcu gcig pa/ rgya mtshos smras pa/ nam mkha' la ni rgyu skar tshogs/ /ji ltar bzhag pa bzhin du ni/ /khyod kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs dran/ /mkhas khyod srid gsum kun gyi gtso/ /khyod kyi snying rje byams pa dper/ /
shes gsal 'gro la snying brtse bzhin/ /kun dpal 'di nas khyod kyis ni/ /lag 'gro thams cad thar bar gyis/ /srid gsum tshul brtul mtshungs med khyod/ /lag 'gro de kun tshim byed khyod/ /khyod ni drang

srong kun gyi bla/ /mi rnams kyis ni mchod par 'os/ /'gro ba kun dpal khyod la ni/ /lha dang lag 'gro gnod sbyin tshogs/ /rten gyi yul rnams thams cad pa/ /lag 'gro myur du thar bar gyis/ /de nas drang
srong skar ma la dga' ba dkon mchog gsum la mchog tu yid dang ba bskyed par 'dod nas de lta bu'i klu'i tshogs thams cad la shin du rigs pa'i tshig snyan pa dag gis 'di skad ces smras so/ /yon tan de
'dra bdag la med/ /drang srong rnga bong bdag ma yin/ /khyed cag 'di nas thar byed par/ /bdag gis nus pa ma yin no/ /gang gis bskal pa du mar ni/ /dka' thub dka' ba bzod pa spyad/ /khyod cag thar

bar byed pa yi/ /drang srong gzhan de blta bar gyis/ /rtag tu brtson zhing sbyin pa byin/ /mkhas shing glang chen rta dang ni/ /shing rta bu dang chung ma dang / /nor gyis sems can phan pa byas/ /rkang lag mgo dang rna ba dang / /

mig dang lpags pa khrag dang ni/ /bu bran bran mo bza' btung mang / /mal cha kha zas sngon chad btang / /snying rje dang ni byams pa yis/ /khyed cag thar byed srid gsum na/ /mtshungs med bsam gtan dga' 'byung

ba/ /de ni drang srong rnga bong ste/ /kun du brtse zhing byang chub sems/ /sngon chad rig byed pha rol phyin/ /sems can mang po sdug bsngal gyis/ /nyam thag pa ni thar bar byas/ /sems can gcig gi ched du
yang / /sngon gyi tshe rabs de bskal par/ /dmyal bar 'gro bzod de yi dags/ /de ni 'jig rten sangs rgyas byung / /sems can sdug bsngal nyam thag kun/ /sdug bsngal mthar mdzad rnga bong yin/ /sems can

sman phyir brtson 'grus dang / /snying rje brtan pos de srid 'khor/ /rnga bong de ni skyes pa na/ /rgyal sras bu ram shing ba yi/ /rigs su zas gtsang gi ni sras/ /des ni btsas ma thag tu khyab/ /srid gsum bde 'byung

'jig rten dpal/ /yid bde rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /lha dang klu yi bu rnams dang / /'byung po gnod sbyin rgyal pos khyab/ /der ni mchod phyir thams cad lhags/ /de yis gom pa bdun bor te/ /ri dang rgya

mtshor bcas pa yi/ /sa ni thams cad 'khrugs par gyur/ /'gro ba rga nad sdug bsngal dang / /'chi bas gzir las ngas bsgral zhing / /zhi ba bde ba mya ngan med/ /skam la dgod ces shAka sras gsungs/ /me tog

dri dang rin chen dag /lha klu rnams kyis gtor gyur cing / /'byung po'i tshogs rnams sna tshogs kyis/ /sras po la ni bstod gyur pa/ /bskal pa mang po du mar yang / /sngon chad khyod kyis dul ba dang / /sbyin dang bsam gtan dgyes la brten/ /

sems can kun ched sdug bsngal bzod/ /'di la skye ba 'di yang ni/ /thams cad kyi ni tha ma lags/ /sdug bsngal thams cad zhi mdzad par/ /ring por mi thogs khyod 'tshang rgya/ /des kyang dpa' bo brtan par gyur/ /mtshungs pa med de bud med tshogs/ /

drug khrid tham pa spangs nas su/ /spyod pa rab bstan lo drug spyod/ /g.yo sgyu can ni sder bcas pa'i/ /bdud ni gcig pus bcom nas kyang / /byang chub zhi mchog gzhal med brnyes/ /mya ngan med lam don dam
gzigs/ /byams dang ye shes thugs rje yis/ /sems can kun dang mi mnyam zhing / /'byung po dag ni thams cad la/ /de ni byams pa'i thugs mnyam pa/ /sems can gang la'ang mtho mi 'tsham/ /

sems can thams cad sdug bsngal las/ /thar bar mdzad cing de yang ni/ /rnam bcings btson ra thar mdzad pa/ /ma ga d+hA na de gnas shing / /'gro ba'i nang na chos kyang ston/ /de la khyod kyis gsol ba thob/ /

byams pa'i yid kyis rnam par ltos/ /drang srong mchog gi thad du deng / /'gro ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad las/ /khyed cag yongs su thar bar byed/ /rang nyid kyang ni 'dong bar gyis/ /dga' mchog bde ba 'dod rnams

kyis/ /phyin cad mkha' lding thams cad las/ /'jigs pa khyed la mi 'byung ngo / /rtag bde sdug bsngal bral dgar gyis/ /btson ra 'di ni g.yo sgyu can/ /bdud ni khyed la rnam par 'tshe/ /ji ltar nga yis bshad pa

bzhin/ /thams cad kyang ni gzung bar gyis/ /yang de'i tshe drang srong thub pa'i gnas rten du klu dang / klu chen po pho dang / mo dang / khye'u dang / bu mo gang dag thams cad 'dus pa de dag thams cad

kyis thal mo rab tu sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jig rten thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa/ chos thams cad kyi dbang gi pha rol tu phyin pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal sel bar mdzad pa/ bde ba thams cad sbyin par

mdzad pa/ dga' ba thams cad skyed par mdzad pa/ shes rab thams cad kyi pha rol du phyin pa/ rtag tu byams pa'i thugs dang ldan pa/ thugs rje thams cad kyis khyab pa/ phrin las thams cad sgrub par mdzad pa/ lam thams cad ston pa/ yang

dag pa'i mig gsung ba/ lha dang klu rnams kyis mchod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /srid pa gsum gyi dgra bcom pa/ mchod pa thams cad 'os/ bdag cag thams cad sdug bsngal gyi btson ra 'dir 'phangs lags na 'di nas bdag cag thar bar mdzad par

gsol/ klu de dag dang lhan cig bdag cag gnas par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis klu de dag thams cad sngon gyi lus kyi gzugs ji lta ba bzhin du bkod de/ gnas de nas 'gro bar mi nus so/ /de dag thams cad kyis drang srong skar ma la

dga' ba la smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa de ni bden te/ sems can thams cad la bde bar bzhed pa rnam par mi 'tshe ba'i chos nyid yin no/ /de la bdag cag skyabs su nye bar gnas so/ /'di nas myur du bzhud cig /bdud

kyi 'ching ba 'di las bdag cag thar bar mdzod cig /skar ma la dga' bas 'di skad ces smras so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa drang srong sems can la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir snying rje chen po'i rgyu 'thun pa thams cad mkhyen pa

thub pa des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la 'khor ba'i 'khor lo rnam par ldog par bya ba'i phyir dang / byang chub kyi lam rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir dang / rgyu dang 'bras bu'i sems can yang dag par bstan

pa'i phyir zhes bya ba nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyi bar du thob par bya ba'i phyir mang por ma byung ba la dmigs pa dang / nyan thos dang thun mong ba sems can la dmigs pa'i gnas pa mchog bstan to/ /yang byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po slob dpon la rag las pa rnams las yang dag par byung ba dang / so sor brtags pa la dmigs pa tshangs pa'i gnas pa bstan to/ /da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i

klung gi bye ma snyed grangs med pa dpag tu med pa rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed na theg pa bla na med pa'i pha rol du phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / sems can thams

cad 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las bsgral ba'i phyir dang / bdud bzhi gdul ba'i phyir dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir chos kyi chus khrus mdzad do/ /da ltar shin du kun du rtog pa'i nyon mongs pa'i tshogs kyi sems
can gyi khams la dmigs pa med pa/ kun nas ldang ba med pa/ rgyu ba med pa/ gzhi med pa/ mtshan nyid med pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ chags pa med pa/ rnam par gzhag pa med pa/ rdul med pa/ mun pa med pa/

snang ba med pa/ gzung ba med pa/ gsal byed med pa/ spyod pa med pa/ tha mi dad pa nyid ces bya ba nas phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / 'byung ba chen po thams cad dang / mig gi rang bzhin tshor ba po med pa'i sred pa zhes

bya ba'i bar nas/ yid kyi rang bzhin tshor ba po med pa'i sred pa'i bar la smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang / 'jug pa med pa'i chos kyi dbyings dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / de bzhin

nyid 'dres pa med pa dang / gang 'jug pa med pa'i chos kyi dbyings don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyis sgrol ba/ phyad pa'i ye shes kyi spyod pa dang ldan pa/ yang dag par dmigs pa'i

de bzhin gshegs pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol du phyin pa drug gi spyod pa dag la yongs su sbyang ba byas pa/ sems nam mkha' dang mnyam zhing mtshungs pa/ ma chags pa'i ye shes mnyam pa nyid

thob pa/ lta ba thams cad kyi bag chags kyi nyon mongs pa yang dag par bcom pa rnams la tshangs pa'i gnas pa dmigs pa med pa ston to/ /kye drang srong skar ma la dga' bas bstan pa 'di bshad pa na yang klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang /

klu'i rgyal po lus 'bigs pa'i khab ces bya ba dang / klu'i rgyal po zla ba la rtsub pa zhes bya ba dang / klu'i rgyal po rin chen skyong zhes bya ba de dag byang chub kyi spyod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sngon bsags pa'i smon lam yang dag

par rjes su dran pas de dag snang ba dang / rnam par bsgyings pa dang ldan pa'i gzungs thob par gyur to/ /de'i tshe klu gzhan brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi ni byang chub kyi spyod pa'i rtsa ba sngon bsags pa'i smon lam yang dag par rjes su dran

pas byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' skar ma la dga' ba la de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so/ /khyod bzhud la snying rje chen po thob pa gang gis 'dir bdag cag bdud

kyi 'ching ba 'di las yongs su thar bar bgyid pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po thob pa de la bdag cag gi tshig gis gsol ba thob shig /de bzhin du bya'o zhes smras nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

skar ma la dga' ba drang srong gi cha byad kyis 'khor drang srong stong phrag mang po dang de nas rdzu 'phrul gyis song ngo / /'phags pa 'dus pa chen po'i sde theg pa chen po'i mdo las nyi ma'i snying po'i le'u bcu gcig pa las brgyad pa'o// //

bcom ldan 'das la klu thams cad skyabs su nye bar gnas pa bdud sdig can gyis thos te/ shas cher 'khrugs shing skrag la rgya shug gi 'dab ma bzhin du lus rab tu 'dar zhing lus rngul nas lag pa gnyis bsgreng ste 'di skad

ces smras so/ /lag 'gro rnams ni skyabs su dong / /skye dgu thams cad rmongs gyur cing / /'chi med lam la gzhog byed pa/ /mi zad g.yo sgyu can la ltos/ /de'i tshe na bdud kyi bu mo mun bral ma zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces
smras so/ /sems can gang dag thos tsam gyis/ /dge sbyong la ni skyabs su mchis/ /gang dag de yi tshig thos shing / /de mthong ba lta smos ci 'tshal/ /brtson 'grus sna tshogs sbyor ba yis/ /
khyod kyis yun ni ring du gzigs/ /bka' mchid sna tshogs lhan cig mdzad/ /de yi sgyu ni ma bslabs sam/ /bdud kyis slar smras pa/ /dge sbyong gau tam brtan pa yin/ /rang bzhin mkhas
pa chen po ste/ /stong pa'i chos la yang dag zhugs/ /rgal nas skye dgu sgral bar byed/ /mun bral mas smras pa/ stong pa la ni gang zhugs pa/ /bdud rnams bye bas mi bskyod de/ /byang grol bde ba sbyin
bgyid pa/ /de la bdag ni skyabs su mchi/ /mtshan nyid ma mchis ldan pa yi/ /de bzhin nyid la gang rten cing / /ye shes kyi ni pha rol phyin/ /de la bdag ni skyabs su mchis/ /sgyu de
bdag gis bslab par bgyi/ /sems can thams cad rnam par dgrol/ /chos rnams kun la dbang sgyur ba'i/ /bla med sangs rgyas 'grub par shog /bdud kyi bu mo lnga brgya snyed bdud kyi gnas
der 'khod nas byang chub tu smon lam btab par gyur te/ bdud sdig can shas cher 'khrugs shing dngangs te rmongs nas stobs kyi shugs kyis 'chag sar zhugs te/ bdud kyi stobs kyi

shugs kyi cho 'phrul gyis byin gyis brlab pa de lta bu byin gyis brlabs so/ /gang gis drang srong skar ma la dga' ba de nas song nas ring po ma lon par drang srong thub pa'i gnas rten der bdud kyi gnas de nas nam mkha' las rdo'i char
pa me rab tu 'bar ba'i char mngon par rab tu dbab par brtsams te/ klu thams cad thal bar rlag par 'dod na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus der me tog gi char rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu bab ste/ klu thams
cad rab tu dga' bar gyur to/ /dga' khyab mas smras pa/ kye bdud kyi bu mo dag khyed ltos shig /'dzam bu'i gling der dge sbyong gau ta ma la klu gang dag skyabs su dong ba de dag thams cad kyang

'di sdug bsngal mang pos gnod par byed na gang dag 'dir 'khod nas dge sbyong gau ta ma la skyabs su dong ba rang gi bu mo khyed la lta smos kyang ci dgos/ bdud kyi bu mos 'di skad ces smras so/ /sangs rgyas skyabs
su sems can su 'gro ba/ /bdud rnams bye bas gsad par mi nus te/ /tshul khrims nyams shing blo ni 'khrugs zin kyang / /de ni nges par skye ba'i pha rol 'gro/ /ston pa la ni me tog gcig gtor zhing / /
byang chub smon lam brtan po bskyed pas na/ /de ni bdud rnams du mas gsad mi nus/ /nem nur med par 'jig rten sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /de yis bslab pa'i gzhi ni gcig blangs shing / /tshig gi don
gcig tsam yang nyan byed la/ /byang chub phyir ni sems kyang bskyed pa de/ /sems can kha lo sgyur 'gyur nem nur med/ /yab klu tshogs 'di mthong ste sangs rgyas kyis/ /der ni me tog char pa sna
tshogs 'bebs/ /sangs rgyas yul gcig gis ni khyod la bsngos/ /der ni ci yang nus par ma gyur to/ /gang gis sems can de dag sdig zad cing / /bdag cag gi ni las kyi sgrib 'byang ba/ /
ched du lung bstan pa ni der nyan pa'i/ /rig pa gcig kyang der ni ston pas gsungs/ /de nas bdud sdig can shas cher 'khrugs shing gshe ste/ sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ba skyes nas mya ngan
gyi khang par gcig pu 'dug go/ /de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma la dga' ba bcom ldan 'das kyi tshangs pa'i gnas pa dmigs pa med pa'i gtam gyi tha mar mjug thogs su
bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa der phyin te 'dug go/ /bcom ldan 'das ga la ba zhes bya ba nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma la dga' bas 'di skad ces gsol
to zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' gnas yid la bgyid pa'i gzungs sngags bshad par gsol/ gzungs sngags kyi gzhi de dag gis ni sngon bdag cag gnyis bram ze'i

khye'u gnyis su gyur pa na lus kyi slad du rgyal po rgyal gyi lha la nongs pa bgyis pas 'gum pa la thug ste btson rar stsal nas/ zla ba phyed zas dang bral zhing bcing ba lngas bcings nas de bzhin gshegs pa man dA ra ba'i
bsung la yid la gzhan mi sems par gsol ba btab pa lags so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa man dA ra ba'i bsung bdag cag la thugs brtse bas rang gi gnas kyi shul kar bzhugs nas sangs rgyas kyi yul

gyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul lung bstan pa de lta bus bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' gnas yid la bgyid pa'i gzungs sngags bstan te/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus brtson ra der bdag cag gi rna lam du don dang bcas/ tshig

'bru dang bcas par grags so/ /gsang sngags yid la bgyid pa de dag gis bdag cag dga' ba dang dad pa yang dag par bskyed nas de'i tshe bdag cag gi mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba thams cad dang / skyes nas
myong bar 'gyur ba dang / lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba thams cad dang / las kyi sgrib pa thams cad dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / sems can gyi

sgrib pa dang / sbyin pa'i sgrib pa zhes bgyi ba nas shes rab kyi sgrib pa zhes bya ba'i bar dang / nye bar spyod pa dang / longs spyod kyi sgrib pa dang / tshe'i 'du byed bas pa'i sgrib pa dang / bsams bzhin

du srid par skye ba'i sgrib pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rnams su 'gro ba'i sgribs pa yongs su bas shing / der bdag cag bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' gnas yid la bgyid pa'i gzungs sngags thos

pa tsam gyis mod la mgrin pa 'ching ba lnga las grol te/ btson ra nas rdzu 'phrul gyi yul thob par gyur cing / de nas nam mkha' la chas nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa man dA ra ba'i bsung gi thad du nye bar

phyin to/ /de nas shi 'phos nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing ri bo'i 'od ces bgyi bar skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi mdog gi thad du rab tu byung nas shes bgyi ba nas slan chad bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis par

sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa rnams su bdag cag ma skyeso zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /de bzhin du da ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed thams cad du 'di dang 'og min la thug pa'i bar gyis thams cad sems can mi dang mi ma lags pa

dpag tu ma mchis pas khyab ste/ de dag ni las kyi sgrib pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / sems can gyi sgrib pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis zin to zhes bgyi ba nas sangs rgyas
kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rnams su las yongs su ma dag pa dag gis sgribs te mchis par mi nus pa lags so zhes bgyi ba'i bar du'o/ /sems can gyi las kyi gzungs sngags thos ma thag tu sems can

rnams kyi mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba dang / lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba dang / las kyi sgrib pa thams cad dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / sems can gyi

sgrib pa dang / sbyin pa'i sgrib pa zhes bgyi ba nas shes rab kyi sgrib pa zhes bya ba'i bar dang / nye bar spyod pa dang / longs spyod kyi sgrib pa dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi sgrib pa mchis pa thams cad dang /
thos ma thag tu skye ba'i sgrib pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dag tu 'gro ba'i sgrib pa mchis pa thams cad yongs su bas par 'gyur ba dang / chos bstan pa des sems can rnams bzod pa

dang ting nge 'dzin rnam pa sna tshogs thob par 'gyur ba dang / ji srid 'tsho ba'i mtha'i bar du der 'chi ba'i dus bgyis nas sems can rnams ji ltar bsam pa bzhin du srid par skye ba len par rngo thog par 'gyur ba dang / tshe rabs dran par

'gyur ba dang / rtag par rgyun du brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par len pa dang / log par mi ltung ba'i chos can rnams su 'gyur ba dang / pha rol du phyin pa drug la mngon par brtson pa

dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la mngon par brtson pa dang / chos nyan pa dang / dge 'dun la rim gro bgyi ba dang / bsam gtan gyis rnam par rol pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / tshangs pa'i gnas pa sgom pa la

mngon par brtson par 'gyur ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad du bla na med pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du chos de dag dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das da sems can thams cad la thugs brtse
ba'i slad du btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' gnas yid la bgyid pa'i gzungs sngags de legs par bshad par gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu gang khyod skye bo

mang po la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa legs so legs so zhes bya ba nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can

su la la theg pa gsum las theg pa gang yang rung bas srid pa'i rgya mtsho las rgal bar 'dod pa ni myur du theg pa de yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod pa yin la/ sdug bsngal thams cad 'joms par 'dod pa yin/
thos pa thams cad kun du 'dzin par 'dod pa yin/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi gnas ngan len thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'dod pa yin/ bstan pa bsrung bar 'dod pa yin/ snyan pa 'dod pa dang /

rnyed pa 'dod pa yin/ bza' ba dang btung ba mang po 'dod pa dang / dbang phyug 'dod pa dang / gzugs 'dod pa dang / stobs 'dod pa dang / 'khor 'dod pa dang / nor dang 'bru 'dod pa dang / thu bo 'dod pa dang / mi dang mi ma yin thams

cad kyis mchod par 'os par 'dod pa yin/ rtag tu lus 'dod pa yin/ rtag tu lus dang / ngag dang yid kyis kun du gnod par 'dod pa yin zhing myur du bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug

pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / tshangs pa'i gnas pa dang gzungs dang bzod pa rnam pa sna tshogs bsgrub par 'dod pa yin no/ /de ltar yang las kyi sgrib pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa shas cher 'phangs pa rnam pa sna tshogs

kyis shes bya ba nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gro ba'i sgrib pa rnams kyis bsams bzhin du srid par skye ba blangs pa de'i bar gyis myur du dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa sna tshogs de lta bu de dag sgrub par mi nus te/

las kyi sgrib pa de lta bu de dag gis zin pa'i phyir ro/ /gang zag de khrus byas te gos gtsang ma bgos shing / lam dang lam gtsang ma der skyil mo dkrung ngam 'chags pas rung ste/ rjes su 'thun pa'i tshes brgyad

la sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs yid la byed pas gzhan yid la mi sems par zhes bya ba nas las gzhan mi byed cing sems rnam par g.yengs pa ma yin pa'i bar gyis re shig mtshan gcig gam zhes bya ba nas mtshan

bdun gyi bar du gnas par byed na des rang gi sku byed du sangs rgyas mthong ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /gal te sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs chung ngur rtog par byed na chung ngu kho nar mthong ngo / /yang na tshad med par rtog

par rtog par byed na gzugs kyi sku tshad med pa yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo / /des mtshan thog thag mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis mthong ngo / /mtshan gang las kha dog sngon po'i 'od 'phro ba'i mtshan gcig po de

nyid la yid kyis rjes su bltas nas gsang sngags 'di dag brjod do/ /tad ya thA/ bi dzrim b+hu bi dzri ma b+ha/ ud pA da/ bya ya/ bi dzri ma b+ha/ sna ba ba ra a nu da ta thA tA b+hU ta ko Ti bi dzrim b+ha swA hA//

ji srid du des kha dog sngon po'i 'od 'phro ba rnam par spel nas de dag byung ste/ rang gi mgo'i spyi bor zhugs pa de srid du des mtshan gcig la rnam par mi g.yeng ba'i yid kyi rjes su bltas nas tshig 'di dag brjod cing mi

skrag par bya/ mi dngang bar bya'o/ /rang gi lus la mer rnam par blta bar bya ste/ ji lta zhe na/ des kha dog sngon po'i 'od 'phro ba rang gi lus kyi yan lag dang nying lag thams cad du 'gro ba mthong nas rang gi lus

thams cad rab tu 'bar bar mthong ngo zhes bya ba nas thal ba bzhin du mthong ngo zhes bya ba'i bar dang / phyogs bzhir rlung gis ma lus par khyer ba stong pa bzhin du mthong ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ phyogs thams cad du de

la gzugs snang ba gang yang mi 'byung ba 'di ni de'i thams cad sgrub pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu su la la sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa de lta bu'i bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' gnas yid la byed pa'i gzungs sngags shin du bsgoms

shing mchod sbyin legs par byas la shin du yid la byas na de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa zhes bya ba nas ma lus pa'i bar du yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/ /
mtshams med pa'i las rnams dang / dam pa'i chos spangs pa rnams dang / 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa rnams ni ma gtogs so/ /de 'dod na de ltar nyin mtshan gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi gsung
thams cad dang / phyi rol pa'i bstan bcos thams cad dang / rig pa'i gnas bcwa brgyad dang / gzhan yang gang dag snyan dngags su byas pa rnams des the tshom med par shin tu 'dzin par
'gyur ro/ /de nyin mtshan gcig gis bsam gtan bzhi dang / gong ma rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par

'jug pa bzhi bsgoms par 'dod na des shin du bsgoms pa yin no/ /de 'dod na skad cig gcig gis sems can thams cad kyi dus gsum gyi 'gro ba'i 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba dang sems kyi spyod pa rab tu shes par 'gyur ro/ /
de 'dod na skad ces gcig gis nam mkha' thams cad rang gi lus sam/ sangs rgyas kyi sku'am/ brgya byin gyi bar ram tshangs pa'i bar ram/ sred med kyi bu'i bar ram/ dbang phyug chen po'i bar ram/
rgyal chen bzhi'i bar ram/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i bar ram/ chu'i bar ram/ me'i bar ram/ sa'i bar gyis gang bar byed do/ /de 'dod na skad cig gcig gis nam mkha' thams cad me tog gi
bar dang / rin po che'i phreng ba dang / spos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / ras bcos bu dang / chos gos dang / rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyi bar dag gis gang bar byed do/ /sus

bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' gnas yid la byed pa sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa de lta bu shin du bsgoms pa yin zhing shin du 'dres par byas la shin du yid la byas pa yin pa de'i las tshad med pa de lta bu ma lus par byang bar
'gyur ro/ /de de ltar bsod nams dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / bzod pa dang / rnam par rol pa dang / mngon par shes pa tshad med par 'gyur ro/ /
des de ltar gang yang rung ba dag yongs su rdzogs par byas na myur du 'khor ba las rnam par thar bar 'gyur te/ mtshams med pa byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs

pa ni ma gtogs so/ /de lta yin yang mtshams med pa byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa de yang / bdun phrag bdun du bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' gnas yid la byed pa sangs rgyas

rjes su dran pa 'di 'dir ji ltar bstan pa bzhin sgom par byed na bdun phrag bdun po de 'das nas las kyi sgrib pa sum bcu ma zad cing lhag ma skyon med par ma lus par byang bar 'gyur ro/ /bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' gnas

yid la byed pa sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom pa de lta bu de ni de ltar don che ba yin no/ /su la la bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' gnas yid la byed pa sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa 'di de ltar thos pa tsam rna lam du thos pa de la mi 'am mi ma

yin pa'i bar de nye bar brtags nas dad pa dang / dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba skye'o/ /de btson ra'i 'ching ba dam po las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/ /gang su dag sdug bsngal bar gyur pa'i sems can thams cad kyang

sdug bsngal dag las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/ /longs spyod kyi sdug bsngal dang / chad pa dang / brdeg pa dang / g.yangs sa dang / me dang / chu dang / dug dang / dgra thams cad dang / 'byung po thams cad dang / nad

kyi 'jigs pa dang / gnas kyi 'jigs pa dang / rgyal po'i 'jigs pa dang zhes bya ba nas bran kyi 'jigs pa zhes bya ba'i bar dang / ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i 'jigs pa zhes bya ba'i bar las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/ /bde 'gror 'gro

ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro/ /su sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa de lta bu thos pa tsam rna lam du grags na de la nye bar gartags nas dad pa skyes ste/ de ltar don che zhing phan yon che ba yin na su ji ltar bstan pa bzhin de bzhin du

bsgom pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na sngon yongs su sbyang ba byas pa dkrigs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad bcu rtsa drug ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin de thob par gyur

to/ /ji ltar sngar bshad pa bzhin du yon tan de dag dang yang ldan par gyur to/ /de'i tshe srog chags khrag khrig phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi ni sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /de'i tshe sems can dpag

yas pa kha cig ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor dang 'bras bu dang po la gnas par gyur to/ /kha cig ni dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar thob par gyur to/ /de'i tshe sems can dpag yas pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par

rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sngon ma bskyed pa'i sems bskyed do/ /mun bral ma la sogs pa'i bdud kyi bu mo lnga brgya po de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus bdud kyi gnas su 'khod bzhin sems yongs su sbyang ba'i sangs rgyas rjes

su dran pa'i lung bstan pa 'di thams cad thos so/ /thos nas kyang bud med kyi dngos po mi snang bar gyur te skyes pa nyid thob bo/ /gang dag sngon yongs su sbyang ba byas pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin

dang ldan par gyur to/ /ji skad bshad pa bzhin du yon tan de dag dang ldan par gyur to/ /de dag thams cad tshangs pa chen po'i cha byad du bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas tshangs pa chen po re re yang bye ba brgya stong phrag mang pos yongasu

bskor cing bye ba brgya stong phrag mang pos mdun gyis bltas te/ sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa bye ba brgya phrag mang pos yongs su bskor nas de dag bdud kyi gnas bsam gyis mi khyab pa bkod pa nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du

babs te/ bcom ldan 'das de la lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dag dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag dang / rin po che'i ras bcos bu dang / chos gos sna tshogs gtor cing mngon par

gtor te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /'phags pa 'dus pa chen po nyi ma'i snying po'i le'u bcu gcig pa las

sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i le'u ste dgu pa rdzogs s+ho// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma la dga' ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu lag 'gro'i tshogs thams cad
kyi zhal ta byos shig ces bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pa'i sems kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dus lags kyis gshegs shig /
bcom ldan 'das gang khyod kyis mdzad pa mdzad cig bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu gang de bzhin gshegs pas lag 'gro'i las bstan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su 'byang ba lung bstan

pa bshad pa rab tu bstan pa'i dus yin no/ /yang de'i tshe lha thams cad ces bya ba nas grul bum thams cad ces bya ba'i bar dag me tog dang / spos dang / rin po che dang / ras bcos bu dang / chos gos dang / rgyan dang / spud pa

dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyi char pa dag rab tu 'bebs shing sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi rol mo'i sgra 'byin pa la mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad kyis bsngags pa'i yon tan gyis

bstod nas bcom ldan 'das gdan las mngon par bzhengs te ri'i rgyal po ri rab ga la bar byang phyogs su nye bar gshegs so/ /'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha thams cad kyis kyang gang bcom ldan 'das

nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor te ri rab kyi rtse mor gshegs par bzhed par shes so/ /de ltar rig nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir rin

po che sna bdun las byas pa ras bcos bu sna tshogs dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i me tog bkram pa'i them skas sprul nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gi them skas las gshegs par gsol/ lha'i bu gzhan

'phrul dbang byed rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi them skas tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i phye ma sna tshogs bkram pa dag sprul nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi them skas

rnams las gshegs par gsol/ lha'i bu 'phrul dgas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir lha rdzas kyi gser gyi them skas tsan dan sa mchog sna tshogs bskram pa sprul nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi

them skas las gshegs par gsol/ lha'i bu yongs su dga' ldan gyi bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir lha rdzas kyi bai dUr+ya'i them skas dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i tsan dan gyi phye ma sna tshogs bkram pa sprul nas 'di skad ces
gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gi them skas las gshegs par gsol/ lha'i bu rab 'thab bral gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir lha rdzas kyi phye ma sna tshogs bkram pa sprul nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom

'das bdag gi them skas las gshegs par gsol/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir mu tig dmar po'i them skas lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi phye ma sna tshogs dang / rin po che'i dra ba
sna tshogs kyis yongs su khebs pa sprul nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gi them skas las gshegs par gsol/ rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir lha rdzas kyi rin

po che rdo'i snying po las byas pa lha rdzas kyi ras bcos bu sna tshogs kyis rab tu khebs pa'i them skas de nyid sprul nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi them skas las ri rab kyi rtse mor gshegs

par gsol/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po bzhi 'khor dang bcas pas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir lha rdzas kyi spug gi them skas lha rdzas kyi gser gyi phye ma sna tshogs kyis yongs su khebs pa de nyid du sprul nas 'di skad ces
gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi them skas las ri rab kyi rtse mor gshegs par gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de dag la thugs brtse nas bdag nyid 'dun pas bdag dang 'dra ba'i sangs rgyas kyi sku drug

sprul nas sangs rgyas bdun po de dag lha'i dbang po dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po thams cad kyi mdun du nyan thos kyis mdun du bdar cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor nas bcom ldan 'das bkod pa

chen po de lta bus ri rab kyi rtse mor gshegs so/ /sangs rgyas bdun po de dag mchog tu lhan ne lhang nger ri rab kyi rtse mo na bzhugs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi sku re re las 'od zer 'di lta bu byung ste/ dper na zla ba dang nyi ma bye ba

phrag stong shar ba bzhin no/ /klu gang dag drang srong thub pa'i gnas rten du lhags pa de dag thams cad kyis de mthong nas ltad mor gyur te gcig la gcig dris pa/ snang ba chen po'i nang na rten pa ri rab kyi rtse mo la gnas

pa bdun po de dag ga las 'ongs/ dga' bo dang nye dga' gnyis gyis smras pa/ ri rab rtse la lha rnams lhan cig tshangs pa'i mdun na 'dod pa 'di gnas pa/ kun mchog lha yi dbang phyug shin du mkhas pa rnams kyi rig
pa'i pha rol phyin/ /bdag cag la ni brtse bas 'dir gnas dpal gyi gzi brjid kyis ni longs spyod byed/ /'ching ba rnams las thar bar byed kyis kun kyang de la mgo bos phyag 'tshol cig /ma dros pas 'di
